Reviews.Content: Looks great has great sound and does its job admirably.  I can't complain at all about this television.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: happy happy happy
Reviews.Author: nelda k conoyer
Reviews.Content: Very good picture quality.  Very good sound. It was easy for me to set up.  The fact that it was under three hundred fifty bucks was a great value.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: brett shepherd
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 of these at $315 for my bar area. They are nice  looking and picture quality is good.Liked them enough to by another one at $365 a week later for my office.

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: Daniel H.
Reviews.Content: I like the tv, the picture quality is very good,the sound is good but not great. For the price it is good

Reviews.Title: Very nice tv for the bonus room/kids room
Reviews.Author: Moto Man
Reviews.Content: So far so good with this tv.  it's been nearly a month in service with no known issues, and hopefully it'll last much, much longer.

Reviews.Title: Vibrant, affordable screen
Reviews.Author: Marlo Gotopo
Reviews.Content: The colors are vibrant, works very good with most of my periphereals, such as Wii, DVD and cable hd box. It has very good customization options and a very useful eco mode which lets you auto select a low power use. Reccomended, though it doesn't have much audo outputs beyond the digital port.

Reviews.Title: On sale - I was lucky!
Reviews.Author: Stacym
Reviews.Content: I got this TV on sale a few months ago at an incredibly good price. And, I'm really glad I decided to get it. The picture is beautiful! We use it for gaming, watching movies, etc... I'm really impressed with the quality. Decided to go with the 39" instead of the larger size. But, no complaints. It's just right. What's more, with the fairly large picture, it's not remotely big or bulky; makes it easier for moving and what not.All in all, I certainly recommend this purchase if you're on the fence about it.

Reviews.Title: I think mine is a lemon
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: First of all, I like the size and features of this T.V. I've been a huge fan of Lg's and that's why I went with this line up.That being said I think I may have gotten a lemon, or at least I hope I did because this T.V. is wholly sub-par in every category of operation.First off the sound quality is terrible.  Not that I expect great sound out of two 10 watt speakers but the voices shouldn't not sound distorted and high pitched.  After playing with some of the sound settings I found that "sport" mode is tolerable, but everything else just sounds wrong.Secondly the image quality is way below expectations.  The T.V. shows horrible whites and the blacks are really only black.  I had to turn a movie off last night in disgust because the dark scenes were just a black screen.  I could see movement on the screen but no detail.  I've worked with the calibration and the only way to see any detail of a dark scene is to go with "vivid" which makes anything that has color look distorted and the light parts of the image just a glare.  I have a small LED-lit Lg T.V. in my bedroom and I have no problem seeing these scenes with great clarity, no matter what setting I use so I know it's not just the technology that is failing here, it's either a bad T.V. or a bad line up of T.V.'s.Lastly my wife notices considerable motion blur during faster scenes.  I can't falut the T.V. for this because it is only designed with a 60hz refresh rate, and the research I've done does say that motion blur is an issue with t.v's larger than 32" that are only 60hz.  I don't notice the blur myself.Just a few notes on design, this is a direct lit LED t.v. so dont expect a super slim design.  This t.v. is actually thicker than a plasma I just bought.  Also there are only 2 HDMI ports, this isn't an issue for me but it might be for some people.I gave the T.V. three stars because I recognize that it could just be my T.V. that is bad and not every LN 5300 out there.  Otherwise it would get 1 star.

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture and price
Reviews.Author: Henry Windeler
Reviews.Content: This TV just fits inside my cabinet with no room to spare. Remote is not loaded with useless buttons and has easy to read letters.

Reviews.Title: Great product for a good deal!
Reviews.Author: nomorenadia
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for $395-ish (after tax) and so far i'm really happy with it.Great picture quality, great sound. I was surprised at how quickly it arrived, bought it and received it about 2 days later (with free standard shipping!!) everything was packaged well. i'm really happy with my purchase so far :)i'm giving this product five stars not only because it's such a good deal for the size and quality of the product but because shipping was really fast.

Reviews.Title: Great television at an affordable price!
Reviews.Author: Sherri L Belcher
Reviews.Content: I love my new television!  First off, the purchase price is more realistic than other electronic pricing out there.  These products do not last long enough to spend a ton of money on, and the technology becomes outdated very quickly.  I did my research and I believe that Amazon offers the best price for the quality on the LG TVs.  The TV is lightweight and the 32-inch is the perfect size for my bedroom.  Unlike the older LED TVs, this one has a wonderful picture quality from all angles.  I bought the Cheetah Mount Articulating Arm to mount it on the wall and would highly recommend this option.  I have had other LG electronics and have had great luck with them.  I do believe they make great products.

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: B. Mason
Reviews.Content: Ok, here's my spill. I bought a brand new model in January 2014. I read many reviews; good, bad, and in-between.Un-boxing-nothing was missing, remote came with crappy factory batteries as usual.Factory speakers aren't as crappy as the ones I read about in some reviews. I had them up about 65 and that was the highest limit I wanted before I thought I'd break them.No broken pixels, no scratches, no chips, nothing wrong.I have a PS3 hooked up for when my nephew comes over, along with a Chromecast. I have Comcast for Cable and Netflix for everything else. My room is 10x10 and I feel it is adequate. I have a large double-window which creates a lot of glare so full-dark curtains keep the glare off.I've had no problems with it this TV since I got it. I purchased a warranty just in case.

Reviews.Title: Compared to the others I have purchased, this one gets five stars!
Reviews.Author: Leonard Gillett III
Reviews.Content: Excellent.  This particular set went into a rest home room where our mother is residing.  In her nineties, she just can't do without her TV. It really is a nice unit, especially the expansive screen.  Kind of surrounds you.  I would highly recommend it to anyone for any room in the house.

Reviews.Title: PC Gaming on a big screen!
Reviews.Author: Zanriel
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace my old Dell Ultrasharp 22" 1680x1050 monitor. It was five years old and I was starting to feel left out of the whole 1080p format that has now become standard. I was comparing the LG 32LN5300 to the Samsung EH5000. I can't really say why but I decided on the LG. Maybe it's because that's the TV I have, and it's lasted longer than any other TV I've had.I did have to go through the picture wizard a couple times when I first set it up to adjust the sharpness, brightness, contrast, and color balance. At first there was a faint outline around everything, giving the picture a slightly embossed look. After tweaking, however, everything is sharp, bright, and clear. I also had to adjust the Windows sound properties to make sure the sound wasn't trying to go through the HDMI (I have my own speakers and sound card TYVM!).I love it! There's no streaking, no ghosting or tearing, it's totally immersive sitting on my desk, feels like I'm in an IMAX theater. Movies, games, web browsing, everything looks fantastic on it. And the price was great too! As long as you're not stuck on the idea of 1440p, if 1080p is good enough for you, I'd easily recommend this model to anyone looking for a new monitor.

Reviews.Title: Bought this then sold it the next week.
Reviews.Author: Ryan G. "-RG"
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed to find out that the USB port would not play videos like my other LG TV. Paid $289 for this TV at the time. The new price of $249 seems much more reasonable for the lack of features this TV has. If you just want something basic for watching HD satellite/cable or playing video games then this would be great. I would not suggest it as a computer monitor because the ppi is way too low for sitting close to it.Pro:Good pictureThin bezelElegant base designCon:USB only plays photos/musicVery thick for today's standardsFew ports

Reviews.Title: LG Electronics 42" LED TV
Reviews.Author: Karen Blankenship Landrum
Reviews.Content: I've already given it a five-star rating as I absolutely LOVE it, already, after receiving it just yesterday!!  I'm disabled, a woman, & it was just too heavy for me to get out of the box.  I also didn't want to try to get it set up thru my AT&T; u-verse, in case I didn't see or figure out how.  So I had a tech come out, & to my surprise & delight, they were able to be here @ 8:30 AM!  It was set up, original TV (32") moved to bedroom as my little 19" doesn't work for me anymore while I'm in bed as my eyesight is getting worse & it was set up as well, the 32", & ALL was accomplished within an hour, or less!!  Been, HAPPILY watching this wonderful TV from Amazon, sitting on a TV stand from Amazon, as well!  They look WONDERFUL together!  I set the settings to my likings, have watched a recorded show in Standard mode & have watched several channels after that in HD mode!  HAPPY CAMPER, HERE!!  :)  Oh, & it arrived right on time!!  Thank you, Amazon!!!  :)

Reviews.Title: A great value
Reviews.Author: Golden Lion "Reader"
Reviews.Content: LG produce some of the best consumer electroics.  I reviewed many different brands before selecting lg 42 inch flat screen to mount on my wall.  I am not disappointment by the quality.  The sound and image was excellent.The price is very appealing.  I think LG color is the best.  The realism is not as good as smart tv, but it is good enough for my needs.  The brightness of the screen does not make your eyes hurt after watching long hours of tv.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: mary barnhouse
Reviews.Content: I looked everywhere for a TV just this size. I had seen the LG's in the store and loved the picture quality, but they didn't have the size I needed. Amazon came through again and had just the right one for me. It was a great price and I never worry when I order from Amazon. I have never been disappointed with anything I have purchased. Nothing could be easier or more convenient.

Reviews.Title: Save your time, and money
Reviews.Author: Street
Reviews.Content: By far the worst TV I have ever had the privelage of owning.  Right from the start, I had problems.  The buttons in the actual TV would not turn the TV on.off.  The color on the TV would go from color, to gray scale, color, gray, dark gray, color, etc.  And to top it off, this is the Honest truth, the TV started turning itself on and off repeatedly.  I started watching a movie, and within 5 min, the TV just magically turned off.  This happened 10-15x. Returned, refunded, never again.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price-point..
Reviews.Author: Brett
Reviews.Content: Great for the price-point.. thinner than some competitors (this one is 3.1" deep) and has a nice clean picture.. setup was a breeze, the one I got was manufactured in march of 2014, already had the latest firmware installed.  Surprisingly light-weight for a 32" TV.. it does use a special power cable (not your standard PC-type cable).  This is NOT smart-TV, so there are no "apps" and such, which is fine with me as I have it connected to a Fire TV box.Overall, I would highly recommend this.

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC MONITOR  LG 42LN5300
Reviews.Author: T. Tuttle
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT THE LG 42 LN5300 TO USE AS A MONITOR FOR MY COMPUTER.I SEARCHED REGULAR MONITORS BUT COULD NOT FIND ONE BIG ENOUGH FOR MY NEEDS WITHOUT COSTING A FORTUNE. SO I WENT LOOKING AT TELEVISIONS AS THAT IS WHAT I WAS USING BEFORE.I NO LONGER NEEDED 2 TV'S SO I TURNED MY 42" SONY WEGA INTO A MONITOR. IT WORKED GREAT FOR A LONG TIME BUT STARTED TO LOOSE BRIGHTNESS AND CONTRAST  AND I WAS HAVING A HARD TIME SEEING NUMBERS CLEARLY.I WENT WITH LG BECAUSE OF ITS REPUTATION AND FINDING A 42" IN THIS PRICE RANGE WAS GREAT.THIS TELEVISION WAS A PERFECT CHOICE. EASY SET UP WITH HDMI HOOKUP.PUTTING STAND TOGETHER TOOK  WAY LONGER THEN IT SHOULD HAVE BUT ONCE YOU REALLY LOOKED AT PICTURES IT WAS EASY BREEZY. NO WOBBLE OR TILTING.NOW FOR THE GOOD STUFF:PICTURE QUALITY IS OUTSTANDING, VIBRANT COLORS, BLACK BLACKS.NO FLASH LIGHTING OR BANDING, NO BROKEN PIXELS.TELEVISION HAS MANY PICTURE OPTIONS,BECAUSE I AM USING THIS AS A COMPUTER MONITOR I CHOSE THE STANDARD PICTURE MODE.I AM RUNNING WINDOWS 7 PRO. RESOLUTION SET AT  1920 X 1080OTHER OPTIONS THAT WORKED WELL FOR ME WERE,  BACK LIGHT  90: CONTRAST 57: BRIGHTNESS 27: SHARPNESS 20: COLOR 60:REMOTE IS BASIC BUT GOOD FOR MY NEEDS.IT ONLY BEING 60HZ HAS NOT BEEN AN ISSUE FOR ME IT RUNS VERY SMOOTH.THE OTHER OPTIONS IT LACKS AS NOT BEING A SMART TV ETC, WERE NOT IMPORTANT TO ME.I KNEW WHAT I WAS BUYING AND I DIDN'T NEED THEM.ALTHOUGH I WILL NEVER USE THIS AS A REAL TELEVISION I CANNOT COMMENT ON THOSE ASPECTS BUT THERE ARE MANY MANY REVIEWS TOUTING ITS QUALITY.I AM THRILLED WITH MY 42' LG. SO WHETHER YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A GREAT MONITOR OR A FANTASTIC TELEVISION, YOU CANT GO WRONG WITH THIS MODEL AND PRICE.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic basic flat screen
Reviews.Author: Matt Wehnes
Reviews.Content: I bought this for our bedroom to primarily watch the news in the morning. Mounted it to the wall and couldn't be happier with it.It's a basic TV without all the add on garbage, like apps, which sounds better than the experience of actually using them IMO.

Reviews.Title: Super clear picture
Reviews.Author: Bill G.
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture on my attic antenna at my lake home, which is 70 miles from the nearest station antennas. All local channels come through great.

Reviews.Title: Greta TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Adina Decker
Reviews.Content: Great looking tv for the money. Sure the Samsungs have the "smart" apps but if you are going to be using an Apple TV or Ruku or whatever else to control your tv then this TV is all you need.Only down side is that it will only play pictures off of a USB drive it will NOT play video from one. If that's something you want to do look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: LED TV
Reviews.Author: Diane E Andusko "Diane"
Reviews.Content: Purchased the tv to replace an older tv.  It is easy to use and setup.  However, I would have liked more detailed instructions for attaching the base to the tv.  The picture diagram does not clearly detail what the process is.

Reviews.Title: Great buy.
Reviews.Author: Alex Price
Reviews.Content: Fantastic tv. Not a thing I don't like about it. The price especially. Local electronics stores were way more expensive for much less tv.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful TV
Reviews.Author: James H. Lockhart "Jim Lockhart"
Reviews.Content: I have to be truthful: I bought this TV because of its size.  We have a built in entertainment center and this TV fit perfectly.  However, I have been more than impressed with the picture quality and it was easy to set up and easy to use.  This is one great TV.

Reviews.Title: LG 39 - inch LED TV
Reviews.Author: Penny
Reviews.Content: I purchased this elsewhere but wanted to let others know what an excellent TV this is. I found myself replacing my previous television less than 1 year from purchase date so I did some research on TV's. Professional TV repair technicians told me repeatedly this is the best brand to buy. It lasts longest and has the best quality picture of all other brands. I am extremely satisfied with mine and I am so happy I did a little research before buying another TV.You can find less expensive brands but if you want lasting quality spend the money on LG. I highly recommend this to EVERYONE.

Reviews.Title: It has a cheap tuner, but other than that it's good.
Reviews.Author: Marc Burningham
Reviews.Content: Set up was straight forward and easy.  It's somewhat limited on options and inputs, but not unreasonably so.  The biggest drawback is the tuner doesn't appear to have a digital output.  The only audio out on the TV is the optical digital output.  If you use the TV's tuner to watch shows and you are connected to the digital out, you will get static over your sound system.  If you use a cable box, satellite system, or just about any other source for your signal input, this won't be a problem for you. But if you want to watch over-the-air programs, you'll have to shut off your sound system and use the built in TV speakers if you want sound.

Reviews.Title: great. more than expected
Reviews.Author: c3
Reviews.Content: great tv. great price. great sound. picture quality is better than expected. tv is super light weight. i litterally looooove this item

Reviews.Title: clear and awesome
Reviews.Author: Thomas Roberts
Reviews.Content: we got this as a bedroom TV and have been very pleased with the visual clarity and clean sound, blu-ray and PS3 look fantastic, color is sharp and vibrant

Reviews.Title: Very Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: Got a great buy on this TV. It works great, nice sound and good picture. Picture would be better with HD, but I am happy with it just the way it is. My son-in-law could not believe I got this quality for what I paid.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Kerin Bowen
Reviews.Content: New TV arrived safely and quickly at a price significantly under store prices for the same item.  LG product is excellent and set up was easy.  Would do it again if I need another one.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Katherina Potter
Reviews.Content: So far...it seems to do what it was supposed to do. The picture quality is great and I my family says sound quality is also great.

Reviews.Title: Great tv!
Reviews.Author: Chuck H. "Chuck"
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing tv. I love it! It was super easy to attach the base and get everything set up. The tv itself ways next to nothing compared to those bit tube TVs. Great picture.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with this TV.  Like all TVs, it needed help to sound better.  I bought a sound bar from Amazon Warehouse for a reduced price, and it is perfect for this TV.  I especially like the USB input, which works great.  Overall great deal.

Reviews.Title: continuous restarts
Reviews.Author: Jaime Sandrea
Reviews.Content: Buy the tv to be a good deal, I received it a week ago in Venezuela, when I connected the tv constantly reboots've tried everything, read in forums looking for ways to work correctly, but it has not been possible. It's a shame because the picture is really good. I am unhappy because it does not work. It is a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Solid picture, mediocre sound.
Reviews.Author: geoffala
Reviews.Content: I have this tv hung up on the wall in my bedroom. While I have no complaints about the picture quality, the downward facing speakers leave much to be desired in the way of sound quality. The sound is tinny, but I wasn't really expecting anything spectacular if I'm being honest. Just making note in case it helps anyone else.

Reviews.Title: Defective 1st Delivery *2nd Delivery Works Well*
Reviews.Author: Michael Coffey
Reviews.Content: I made this purchase on March 10 and had it delivered on March 12.Got home from work around 7PM, opened the box, mounted to a new Cheetah swivel wall mount (http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B001GTT0VO/ref=oh_details_o03_s01_i00?ie=UTF8&psc;=1), plugged it in, and......broken. The top left quadrant of the screen, along with bottom inch and half (in a wave pattern), were solid black. The entire length of the screen had alternating vertical red, yellow, and green lines.Called Amazon techs and attempted a hard reset to no avail. They immediately placed a new replacement order with One-Day shipping for no additional charge, but it was too late in the day to receive the next day. They also emailed me a return label for the defective television. I always carefully save all wrappers, Styrofoam packing, and boxes in case of a need to move, so I repackaged everything and am dropping it off at a UPS Store today.I will update my review when I receive the replacement TV (estimated delivery date of March 14).***UPDATE 3/17/2014I received the replacement television on March 14, 2014 and managed to work with it and its settings over the weekend. Overall, I'm pleased with the picture and sound quality (after some settings changes) while wall-mounted in my 10' x 14' bedroom. The sleep timer (a must for us), is easily located on the remote, and combined with a Google Chromecast, this TV does exactly what we need of it.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv
Reviews.Author: Germis Muñoz
Reviews.Content: I brought this tv to venezuela, and since i opened it i have not been able to stop watching movies and playing with my ps3 or pc, the image looks awesome.

Reviews.Title: new TV out of the box
Reviews.Author: Jodi Jones
Reviews.Content: We took our new TV out of the box and there is a dent on the top panel and the screen caves in.  I don't think this is how it is supposed to be.

Reviews.Title: LG 39-inch led
Reviews.Author: cathy
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with my LG, everything looks and sounds great, although, did notice a shadow on the screen and can't seem to figure out a way to get rid of it. Otherwise it's great!

Reviews.Title: good picture
Reviews.Author: kim
Reviews.Content: This tv shipped rather quickly, and was so easy to set up (it practically sets up itself) the picture is really,really good! I was watching a 23" that I could hardly see! this is sooooo much better!

Reviews.Title: Genuinely Impressive!
Reviews.Author: Cliff
Reviews.Content: After much attentive searching thru available reviews on 1080p LED-lit 32" flat panel TV sets, I chose LG's 32LN5300...  it has exceeded my expectations and hasn't disappointed in any measure.There's not many manufacturers offering a 1080p LED back lit TV set to select from in this size class.  Fortunately, LG hasn't neglected this segment of the market.From the viewpoint of a buyer who intends to use this set for viewing streaming content and possibly connecting a Blu-ray player, finding any fault or deficits will be extremely difficult.There's extensive user information posted in online forums that indicate numerous customers buying this TV set to use as a computer monitor.  Such speaks directly to the clarity and quality of the image this LG TV is capable of showing.Removal from the factory box and protective packaging was quite easy and set up was "easy peasy" intuitive...  I rarely looked at the included user's manual beyond the "quick set up" guide.Installation was onto a Cheetah ALAMLB Articulating Arm (20" Extension) TV Wall Mount, so I cannot speak to the stability or ease of attaching the stand that's included with this set.All cables are included sans a HDMI cable...  just a "FYI heads up" there.  That's not a criticism as HDMI cables aren't included on any TV set I'm aware of...  nor most all other consumer AV electronics.I've had this TV set in use for over a month and intentionally postponed my review to reflect some actual history past the initial first few days.Based upon the ease of set-up and user controls/interface... and the quality of the picture (sharpness, brightness, contrast, color, etc.), I would not hesitate to recommend this LG TV set.  I do plan on buying another soon for installation in another location.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Christopher Faletra
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product.  It was a great price and the picture is very sharp.  The setup was simple and the TV is surprisingly light so locating the TV was easy.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: Great picture and great price for the quality. Very thin and sleek, I would recommend this product if you are looking for something nice but not a smart t.v.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Carolyn J. Mathews
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my bedroom and it fits on top my dresser perfectly.  I recommend it to anyone with a smaller space.  I already had a larger version in my living room which I love.

Reviews.Title: very sleek and good picture
Reviews.Author: Elkikay
Reviews.Content: Ordered this for our office sales team and love the fact that it is very light so it's easy to pack into our Pelican case for shipping. Picture quality is very good!

Reviews.Title: Does what I want it to do.
Reviews.Author: Ms. Lou Hunnebeck
Reviews.Content: I needed a smaller TV to put in front of my treadmill so I can be distracted while I work out.  This unit is nice and slim, good picture quality, and fits the bill nicely.  No complaints so far!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Zachary Y.
Reviews.Content: T.V. Works well, beautiful picture. It was a little challenging setting up the channels in comparison to other T.V.'s. The T.V. scans through all analog, digital, and lastly cable channels. I have never had to do this with any other T.V. Other than that, which is minor. Great product.

Reviews.Title: WORKS FOR US
Reviews.Author: K. JOHNSON
Reviews.Content: This is our second LG (the first is still going strong after four years) which we recently got for our bedroom.  It was the perfect size at a perfect price.  Navigating the settings menu is typically complex but once accomplished, the set gives us a great picture and good (not great) sound; you'll need external speakers if you're an audiophile.  Sure, there are better sets but the LN5300 does everything we want it to, which translates to a five-star rating.

Reviews.Title: My 3rd LG
Reviews.Author: Seraxia
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my office and needed this size. Was using a monitor as a tv and got tired of not having all the features of a real TV so I bought this and am so glad. Have been using it over a week and it is very nice. Great picture and good tuner, picks up a lot of channels even with no amplifier over a long stretch of cable. Monitors are not good tv's and tv's are not good monitors, jmo...

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Bought it to replace old CRT set and had a specific size to fit it into. A perfect fit and slightly bigger viewing screen as well. Picture clarity is very sharp- even during the day, with a lot of sunlight to compete with. Would easily buy another when it's time.

Reviews.Title: Gregg L. Friedman MD reviews LG Electronics 39 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Julie L. Friedman
Reviews.Content: The LG Electronics 39 inch TV set is wonderful. It has great picture quality on all the channel. The colors are crisp and sharp. It performs well without any technical problems. I give it a 5 star Excellent rating. By Gregg L. Friedman MD

Reviews.Title: Seems nice and works but...
Reviews.Author: Lori
Reviews.Content: I've tried every setting there is and contacted ATT UVerse about trying to get the picture right with the HDMI cable.  I'm exhausted.  The picture is good, HOWEVER, everyone's heads are cut off.  I don't think there is any other setting that I could possibly try.  I guess I'm going to have to live with the fact that I ordered a TV online that doesn't work properly.  I will never do this again.

Reviews.Title: Good choice for our sun room
Reviews.Author: Dani S.
Reviews.Content: We did quite a bit of research before purchasing, and ultimately decided on LG because of good reviews.We needed a not-so-big set for our smallish room, and this size just fits the bill.  This LG has great picture clarity and screen size is perfect for our our space. All in all, this set is everything we were looking for, and at a good price.  Set up was simple, with clear instructions.  Delivery was fast and the packaging was in pristine condition.

Reviews.Title: Review on 42 inch tv
Reviews.Author: Terry Rio
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied Great picture and clarity. Easily assembled and packed securely.  Good price good value. Perfect size for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Bad remote-controller
Reviews.Author: McBae
Reviews.Content: TV LG 32" LED is fine  but its remote-controller is so bad. To change channel I have to shoot beam only in strait direction of the TV. It is not easy because I have to move to change TV channel if I am not in direct direction of the TV. I am very uncomfortable on this TV because of its channel controller.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value! Brilliant colors and the sound quality was surprisingly clear and much louder than expected!!
Reviews.Author: J. Rexroat "The one and only"
Reviews.Content: My main TV is a Samsung that I absolutely love so I really wanted to stay with the brand I love and trust. Then I took a chance on this LG due to the fair price at the time and because I have seen them in so many different businesses that I frequent. Well, the picture is borderline stunning with very bright, clean colors. It has amazing detail and has plenty of options to adjust to your liking. The sound was much better than expected because it is perfectly loud and clear. I thought it would be hard to accomplish due to how thin the TV is. It could have more inputs and outputs but you have to remember how much you are paying. Overall this is a solid TV with a premium name brand! No complaints from me! ;)

Reviews.Title: Great quality and Value
Reviews.Author: JP
Reviews.Content: Excellent- great value.  I didn't need a smart TV, I just hook it to my laptop using a HDMI cable.  TV has a great picture, pretty good sound.

Reviews.Title: delivery of LG32LN5300 1080p TV
Reviews.Author: John W Geary
Reviews.Content: Hooked up in minutes in my garage/workshop. Beautiful picture!!! Your shipper did a great job with packing in plain cardboard box so UPS could leave it without a problem.

Reviews.Title: I don't care much for this TV
Reviews.Author: dnelms
Reviews.Content: This TV can only be watched from an elevation higher than the TV if you want to see it straight out. The stand that comes with the TV only works when the TV is tilted back. Colors are not very rich are strong.If I had to do over again I would've bought a different TV.

Reviews.Title: Looks and works great!
Reviews.Author: mofamily
Reviews.Content: It's our new family TV, it the perfect size for our den without overwhelming the space. Picture and features are nice!

Reviews.Title: Good buy.
Reviews.Author: James G.
Reviews.Content: This TV has an excellent picture, and setup was very easy. Has a built-in setup robot which did a good job.

Reviews.Title: good picture
Reviews.Author: Sandy M. Masterson
Reviews.Content: i like the tv. the speakers/sound system is not up to par in my opinion. I was a little surprised at how unimpressive the sound quality was.

Reviews.Title: Good clear picture
Reviews.Author: JWB
Reviews.Content: Only negative is the speaker(s) are rather "tinny" sounding.  Plan to buy an auxiliary speaker system.  The picture quality is fine.

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: tom walters
Reviews.Content: no issues or problems.i received the tv exactlly the day promised.great picture.i would recommend this to a friend

Reviews.Title: Merry Christmas to me.
Reviews.Author: Books48
Reviews.Content: Wanted a TV for my sitting room and this is perfect. Not too big but big enough for me to see. Good sound and picture.

Reviews.Title: Thanks for the fast deliver.
Reviews.Author: GAShopper
Reviews.Content: Decided to purchase the TV on Friday night and Monday, afternoon the UPS truck was showing up delivering my stuff. Thanks for offering the LG at a great price and fantastic quick shipment using Amazon Prime. In the past, I was a bit leery of  purchasing a TV online, but you've totally changed my perception. Everything arrived safe and sound without any damages at all.Thanks again Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: spaynneuter
Reviews.Content: This was a gift, so I personally don't get to watch it much, but I know my daughter and her family love it.  They think the color and sound are perfect, right out of the box.  I set it up for her as a surprise and the hardest part was getting the stand put together!

Reviews.Title: Am enjoying
Reviews.Author: Rooth2
Reviews.Content: I finally upgraded to a flat screen and decided to go a little large.  I'm glad I did - it gives me the cinema feel.  I love the picture quality, size, the fact that it's so light to carry and the great energy star rating.  I purposefully chose a tv without a lot of ports because I don't hook a bunch of stuff up to it, so if you need ports, this one is limited with only 2 HDMI, 1 cable, 1 component, 1 USB.  The only reason I'm not giving this a 5 star rating is that I've found the remote to be a little fickle.  It works fine about 85-90% of the time then suddenly the tv is not responding.  It's not the batteries and it's not where I'm aiming, so I don't know what the issue is.  This is a good "Starter" TV for anyone looking to upgrade from a Tube TV.  Oh, one thing that would have been nice is a swivel base, but that was not a deal breaker for me, I can just get a lazy susan for that.

Reviews.Title: claim for not work properly
Reviews.Author: xinia
Reviews.Content: This TV is having problems, at first it worked fine, but about 5 days ago  constantly turns itself off. What actions should I take. This was the gift I gave to my mother for Christmas. I appreciate the prompt response.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Leigh A Dwyer
Reviews.Content: I just love this TV. The picture quality on it is excellent and LG is a trusted name brand TV. You won't go wrong purchasing this TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Richard Anderson "Rick Anderson"
Reviews.Content: I had not purchased a new TV in 10 years and so didn't know what to expect, except from all the great reviews that I read.  Amazon gave a great comparison for comparable 42 inch televisions.  It was $200 dollars off list price, which helped in my decision.  I had read issues about the sound being low quality and later ordered a sound bar. I like this TV!  It was easy to hook up to my direct TV, as was the sound bar.  I've had it for two weeks now and couldn't be happier.  I went from a 10 year old, 100 pound 36 inchToshiba to this beautiful 32 pound, 42 inch LG.  Great picture quality.  I highly recommend this TV.  I feel as though I made a great purchase.  Read all of the reviews and make your own decision.  You also get free 30 day tech support from Amazon, just in case you run into any problems, issues or questions.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Greg A. Gustafson
Reviews.Content: great tv, for my Mom. she loves it, great picture and sound, and fit the space she had. she was very pleased

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Bill Murphy
Reviews.Content: So far I am happy with my new TV. Amazon was proved the same as all the department stores and that made it a great. I like buying off the internet.  It  is easy and fast.

Reviews.Title: A Feast For The Eyes
Reviews.Author: Kurt Bernardo
Reviews.Content: I have 2 other LG TVs and I have never had a problem.  I almost bought a smart TV but with the Poku we have it didn't seem to make sense to spend the extra money.  Easy set up...plug it in and let 'er rip!

Reviews.Title: Excellent value for a solid LED TV.
Reviews.Author: Bill McCarthy
Reviews.Content: Very basic but great value for a 1080p LED TV - bought 2 - one for a small den-type room and one for bedroom.  Fit my needs very well.  Stock sound is poor as with most LCD/LED TVs but have found a couple reasonably priced sound bars to compensate.

Reviews.Title: LG 32LN5300
Reviews.Author: PhilnTX
Reviews.Content: This is a great little TV.  Colors are very vivid!  I'm using it in a 10'x8' room and the sound quality by the built in speakers is also great!  No complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: TV is a good buy
Reviews.Author: Philip Novotny
Reviews.Content: TV is acceptable. The 60 Hz causes a slight blur in watching sports or fast moving action packed programming.I would invest in the 120 Hz or better next time for the extra money. Picture quality is great though.

Reviews.Title: Survey - LG 32" LED TV
Reviews.Author: fan of books
Reviews.Content: Easy setup following the easy to read instructions. Excellent picture meets our expectations.  Would make the same choice again given the opportunity.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: L. D. Harbertson "Caerlin"
Reviews.Content: Would recommend.  We installed it.  Struggled a little to figure out all the connections because we are on satellite with aWeird DVr set up. But we figured it out by ourselves.  Love the TV.  Colors are just right.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: KATHY
Reviews.Content: Very happy with my purchase.  I actually purchased the same exact tv at a local store , but it was only 720 as opposed to 1080.  Huge difference in picture quality, and price difference between the 2 was only $50...so a no brainer to return the other one and purchase this one.  I have another larger LG tv that I love and that is why I purchased the same brand.  Very happy with the brand and with pricing on Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Easy set up!
Reviews.Author: Avid reader
Reviews.Content: It took no time to set this television up.  The picture is terrific and the sound is excellent.  Great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: A gift that was warmly accepted!
Reviews.Author: Mitzi
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sister for her bedroom.  She was remodeling and it was the perfect finishing touch.  She loves it, it looks great on the wall and was priced very reasonably during the holiday season.

Reviews.Title: I was wrong.
Reviews.Author: Jon K Bacon
Reviews.Content: Previously I stated that Amazon and Coast to Coast electronics were not correcting my concern with a order. Since then amazon and  Coast to Coast have corrected the problem with my order and both parties were very helpful. If I find anything I want to purchase from amazon and Coast To Coast electronics I will happily make a purchase with no worry's. Coast To Coast electronics and Amazon are great!!!

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: Cheri A. Gaspero
Reviews.Content: We always look to buy LG when we purchase electronic products because they are high in quality and last.  Their products are also 'user-friendly' and you get the most bang for your buck.  This purchase was no different, and Amazon is nearly always the cheapest on products as well as the most efficient in getting the products out to their customers.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Mel BYARS
Reviews.Content: Good TV set but not great. The image is clear and crisp, but it is expensive for one that is only 60HZ with a somewhat deep profile (thickness).

Reviews.Title: As good of a picture as you can get, but bring your own sound system.
Reviews.Author: Rowan C. Reid
Reviews.Content: I got this LED for an amazing price. Here are the key features which I either loved or hatedLOVED- amazing picture out of the box.- nice energy saving features- stable stand- small remote works well with setting menu navigation- inputs seem standard, also has a nice notification whenever inputs are active.- no need to be concerened with the 60Hz, I use this to play Forza with my son's xbox and there is no perceivable blurring.HATED- The speakers seem all but useless. They are ok for the news and day to day shows, but for movies you will need a supplemental system.- Given today's standards the screen is thick, I think to support the down facing speakers (probably one reason they aren't' great)I received this as a factory referb which you couldnt' tell as the protective plastic was still on it and it was in the original box.

Reviews.Title: Excellect TV!
Reviews.Author: Maxx
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture quaility! Limited on options, but I was not looking for a whole of extras. This tv did exceed my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Good Price, Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Th duke 101
Reviews.Content: A great quality LED TV at an excellent price, what more can you as for?! Ive had this TV for about 3 months now and have had no problems at all. I only wish that when i bought it, i knew it had AV Output instead of AV Input. But overall, a great Tv to have.

Reviews.Title: amazing tv.
Reviews.Author: Brodrick Calton
Reviews.Content: I love this tv, quality-wise. But I realized yesterday that it doesn't have an auxiliary input. That was a 100% downer... But other than that, this tv is well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: great experience
Reviews.Author: Susana Peckinpah
Reviews.Content: It is so clear and I don't have any problem seeing anything.  The set up was easy.  Thank you Susana

Reviews.Title: Well worth the Money
Reviews.Author: Ryan L. Caravella
Reviews.Content: Great TV for a fantastic price. The tv screen is gorgeous. I have never owned a LED tv before and am planning to purchase another LG

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Lynice Cragle
Reviews.Content: love this tv. all the pic modes and sound mode are great, and love HDMI you can see the pic from the sides just as well as the front.

Reviews.Title: Great simple TV and a great Amazon price
Reviews.Author: DTee "USABrit"
Reviews.Content: Appears to be a really good TV. Very simple to set up (it took seconds). Nice design. Sound is fair for what it is...but I use supplemental sound system. Delivered a day early by FedEx too.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for a great price.
Reviews.Author: preston
Reviews.Content: This hdtv is amazing. It's a lot better than I expected, this hdtv is great for viewing your favorite shows. However I mostly use it for gaming. This tv works perfectly with the playstation 4. Excellent sound quality an comes with 2 hdmi ports I highly recommend it to anyone it's an amazing tv an an outstanding buy.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture
Reviews.Author: Amanda Garrison
Reviews.Content: Very Nice TV with a great picture and  multiple HDMI connections.  This is used for security cameras / kitchen TV

Reviews.Title: Amazing Price and Quality
Reviews.Author: NEGRA781
Reviews.Content: The quality of this TV is Amazing, Nice size and great picture, the price was great also...I really love it......

Reviews.Title: Excellent T.V. great price
Reviews.Author: SueFla "FlaFan"
Reviews.Content: This is my second LG T.V.  The picture is beautiful, the sound is great.  I would certainly recommend it.  The price was extremely fair as well.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a great price.
Reviews.Author: Karen Maxwell
Reviews.Content: The TV was easy to hook up. It has great color. It occupies the same space as the 37 inch TV it was replacing. Would definitely buy it again.

Reviews.Title: can't wait ti get another one
Reviews.Author: Janis G.
Reviews.Content: What a great TV! The clarity of it is super. Will buy another one when my other TV dies, but will be smaller  for my bedroom.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Jesus Angulo
Reviews.Content: excellent image quality is a highly recommended product in addition to a fair price, you can not ask for more

Reviews.Title: Good buy for a TV not used much!
Reviews.Author: Martin L. Gorman
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time! Easy setup and operation. So far no problems.Color is good and sound is sufficient so external speakers are not required.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv
Reviews.Author: inknzvl
Reviews.Content: This is a nice tv, well quality picture, slim etc. since I bought refurbished: my tv came with a small white washed spot of about 3" by 3". I only noticed when the screen goes black, basically only when I turn on the tv and the few seconds it takes to display picture.• beware: the tv comes with auto brightness ON, at first the picture was very dark I didn't like it. I had to dig into settings and adjust my desired picture set.• the menu screen won't disappear until you specifically exit.• the remote control it doesn't have the best layout, it has all buttons scramble hard to lern and the touch feel wont help when dark since in order to navigate you have to touch say, navigation keys are at bottom then exit key is at middle some like that.•

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: James Shelton
Reviews.Content: PICTURE QUALITY...... Sound quality are both excellent. Easy to use menu system. Over the air tuner works great as well.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic purchase!
Reviews.Author: M. Williams
Reviews.Content: Elegant looking TV.  Beautiful, rich color, easy set up and worth far more than the price.  Highly recommend for every room!

Reviews.Title: 39" LG LN5300
Reviews.Author: Alan E. Schmidt "CD"
Reviews.Content: Excellent color and picture quality. Great value for the money. Received on time and in perfect condition. It was a great value.

Reviews.Title: Gread brand
Reviews.Author: rafael
Reviews.Content: The image of the TV is excellent.  It was a reasonable price for this size of TV.  Very satisfied with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, especially for the price
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: I like this TV though I have had some issues connecting external speakers. There is also no Aux output, which I realize many TV's don't have, but it would be nice. The Eco mode, which automatically turns on unless changed in the setting is pretty annoying though this is an easy fix.

Reviews.Title: Awesome little TV
Reviews.Author: S. Carlson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a bedroom TV for my mother, and neither of us have any complaints. Installing the base stand was a breeze and the initial setup was a no-brainer. After a few minor tweaks to the picture and sound settings (mostly to dial down a little too much red in skin tones) the picture she's getting from DirecTV looks fantastic. As with most flat screens these days, the sound leaves a little to be desired, but as I mentioned it's a bedroom set. Very satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: majid
Reviews.Content: Very good TV amazing.And I think LG is very good company for every thing so all of you buy LG

Reviews.Title: So far so great.
Reviews.Author: Alex Koo
Reviews.Content: Great TV. It has an amazing resolution, a good price. highly recommend to who wants a decent and solid TV.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV!
Reviews.Author: Vesuvius, Fire of Fire "Kristen"
Reviews.Content: This TV is great. The picture looks absolutely amazing, and I think the sound is quite good too (and it can get REALLY loud). Great for watching movies and playing games, the 39" is the perfect size for me, and an affordable price. I have not had any issues with it "turning off" spontaneously as some of the negative reviews had mentioned. Those reviews made me a bit nervous about purchasing this one but no issues whatsoever. Highly recommend. The only (tiny) negative was that it was kind of difficult to get the screws in on the base and they took a lot of force to get them tight, but the assembly was otherwise very simple.  Picture looked great right out of the box, but I definitely prefer watching tv on the "Cinema" picture setting instead of the energy saving setting which is default. The "Game" setting is what I use for playing my games and it's good too.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: ray lang
Reviews.Content: For the price, could not do better. Colors, sound, look, it's all there and is everything I need in a TV. 1st LED!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy for the Money
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Good buy for the money.  Was rated higher by experts that more expensive TVs in it's class.  I'm very happy with this TV.Sound isn't the greatest, but was better than I expected.  But that's the only negative thing I have to say.If I paid $575 I would still be happy and I only paid $400, from Amazon.  I would and have recommended this TV to friends.

Reviews.Title: Great Hd TV
Reviews.Author: MB
Reviews.Content: I have received my HD TV on time, unboxing was very easy and putting the Tv together was very easy. Tv works very well hasn't died on me unlike some reviews i read. Picture looks great and produces Great sound, I would recommend this Tv to anybody who would like great quality Tv with a attractive price.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the money
Reviews.Author: George R.
Reviews.Content: This is my first LG 39" TV I wanted to upgrade from a Sanyo 32" 720p The picture is great sound is good but great when I have the surround sound on, didn't have to change anything . It fit perfectly on the wall where I had the Sanyo fit on the same mount ( Level Mount DC50LP) works . It's lighter then the Sanyo. the only thing is that there is only inputs no outputs and one of the HDMI plugs is in the back cannot put a straight HDMI cord in When you have it on the wall it will bend the plug, you will have to get a 90 degree adapter, they should have put both HDMI plugs on the side . All in all this is a great TV . For a great price I also got a optical cord for the surround .

Reviews.Title: LG tv
Reviews.Author: Janet G. Wray
Reviews.Content: Came very well packaged. Excellent picture. Easy to program for satellite reception. Easy to move. Light weight considering size . No problems encountered so far

Reviews.Title: Very good tv - no problems so far
Reviews.Author: Oslek "Amazon all the way!"
Reviews.Content: No problems so far... We installed the tv about one month ago and have had no problems.  We connected a DVD player and Direct tv box and it worked great  Sound is decent.  No problems so far

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV
Reviews.Author: Luann Hedrick
Reviews.Content: Absolutely no complaints!  Great picture, would definitely recommend to a friend.  Perfect for a small room or for the kid's room.

Reviews.Title: Looks Fake
Reviews.Author: Terese Capriglione
Reviews.Content: First TV did not work. Replacement came 2 days after expected. They never picked up the one that didn't work by the date confirmed. It sat on my porch for 3 days, until the new one was delivered. otherwise the TV itself has a nice picture although since the purchase I have since TV's of similar value for less money.

Reviews.Title: PLEASED
Reviews.Author: toddy
Reviews.Content: LOVED THE PRICE,  WOULD DEFINITELY DO AGAIN.  I CANNOT UNDERSTAND THE NEED TO REQUIRE THIS LONG OF A EXPLANATION, THANKS.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: girlnumber4
Reviews.Content: The television arrived in perfect condition. Setup took about 15 minutes. The picture is crystal clear and sharp. The sound could be better. I tried several sound settings but none of them exactly wowed me however, I purchased this TV for the quality of the image. If I decide I want better sound, it's a simple matter to hook up speakers.  The remote is easy to use which is a plus

Reviews.Title: Disappointment
Reviews.Author: Brittney Kimbro
Reviews.Content: I am so upset that I purchased this tv. I've bought refurbished items in the past and have never had problems. The tv turns itself off every 5 to 10 minutes or so. It's pointless to even watch.

Reviews.Title: $260 for 40days, no good!
Reviews.Author: B. Patrick
Reviews.Content: Was a nice TV. Was very happy with it. TV started to turn of and on all by itself constantly! Today tried to get return with Amazon but the 30 day return expired, TV lasted for 40 days. Hhmmmmmm!!!! These days everything you buy is like Russian Roulette.

Reviews.Title: Cheap 1080p TV
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Great viewing angle on the screen. The picture is nice and bright.Not many ports or options, but hey it's cheap as hell for a 42" LED 1080p screen!

Reviews.Title: Great picture !!
Reviews.Author: Martyn Skaggs
Reviews.Content: What a buy!......Im sure gld i found this lightly used gem. Its perfect for my bedroom since i was recently disabled. If i mount it on the wall it will b like the hospital room ,but with an upgraded tv.

Reviews.Title: I am not totally happy with tjhis product.
Reviews.Author: Angela F.
Reviews.Content: We wanted a big tv for our bedroom. We have a 32" model at our summer home and always said 'we should have gotten a 40",'.  So here at this house, when our 23" tv needed to be replaced, we chose to go to this modle.  We have a really large 60" LG tv in our relaxing room so we  thought this would be good. Not so! Not for us.  The problem is it does not swivel at the base like our other LG. So it is frozen in one position. Also the volume can not be increased the d like way we'd like. Since we are both somewhat hearing impared we find this inconvenient.These are personal flaws, otherwise it is OK, I guess :-(.

Reviews.Title: Returned This TV
Reviews.Author: ARDT
Reviews.Content: Right away I noticed the tv base felt very cheap. Our last tv, from a different company, was also a 42'' but that base was very heavy and sturdy. This base had me worried. We noticed there were 3 options in the manual on how to brace the tv to avoid falling.Option 1.) This option required a hole being drilled into my tv hutch so the tiny screw they provided could be screwed though the cheap plastic base and into my hutch. That was not going to happen.Option 2.) This option required a large hole be present in my tv hutch to loop a cord through that would then be attached to the back of the tv. My hutch did not come with a hole like that and I was not going to put one there.Option 3.) This option would not ruin my tv hutch and seemed the best way to go. All this option required was a trip to Lowe's to purchase 2 eye screws to attach to the back of the tv, rope or cord to tie through the eye screws and secure to 2 'L' shaped anchors that we would bolt in the wall. This would have been fine, but Lowe's does not carry the size eye screw that is needed for this tv.The sound quality was horrible, imo. We knew it would need some adjustment out of the box. I didn't find it improved much.Amazon was very helpful with the return.

Reviews.Title: Nice one..
Reviews.Author: Sudip Ghosh
Reviews.Content: I am a fan of LG products always. so, I purchased this one 42LN5300. And so far i am loving it. Nice color balance and treat to eyes !! Go for it.....

Reviews.Title: really adds a lot to our playroom
Reviews.Author: Judy Dianne
Reviews.Content: We just set this up on the wall with a bracket.I added an antenna and the set quickly picked up 39 channels.Picture looks fantastic and it really is a great addition to the room.I purchased the warranty.

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup and great picture.
Reviews.Author: David N. Middlecamp
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup and great picture.  I like the LED TV's because they take up about the same space as a LCD TV with a smaller screen due to the thinner bezel.  This TV had a good rating in Consumers Reports so I bought it.  So far I'm very pleased with the TV.  It's my first LG purchase.

Reviews.Title: A Good Television Buy
Reviews.Author: Jean M. London
Reviews.Content: A Good Television Buy :  A very clear bright picture but not enough room to plug in the DVD machine without buying an extra cable.

Reviews.Title: Best bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: Tcat "Loves Amazon Over Wally World"
Reviews.Content: As others have said, incredible price/picture ratio.I MADE it a "smart" TV using Chromecast.Sound is a good as one should expect with built-in audio.The base seems a bit clunky, however, with only a little fuss, I was able to wall-mount.

Reviews.Title: Great for those with newer connections and small space.
Reviews.Author: N. S. Charles
Reviews.Content: Picture is crisp, vibrant and colorful.  Menu is deep and explanatory with many different options to configure the television. Start-up time is minimal and shutdown time is optimal.  Button placement on the actual television is great(on the right side between a groove), and the remote is a slender form-fact that gets the buttons right for my big thumbs.  The bezel is thin, smooth and the unit lightweight, the stand takes enough effort to get together and though it lacks any sort of bumper or catch to make the television move less it's highly stable.I don't regret this purchase, and I would definitely buy again.  2 HDMI ports, a cable input, optical out and component in, great for those with newer connections.

Reviews.Title: Just got it!  Awesome!
Reviews.Author: JimInDallas
Reviews.Content: I had to get a new 32-inch because the Samsung I bought at Wal-Mart had sound issues (sounded like the speakers blew out) after 6 months.  I love the picture quality.  The sound is ok, but I am going to play around with the settings.  The price I paid on Amazon for this model is about $100 cheaper than in the box stores here.

Reviews.Title: Great tv at a reasonable price
Reviews.Author: Richie Rich
Reviews.Content: The size fit our application perfectly - is being used for a monitor on a security system.  We view four camera locations at a time and the clarity is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Great Reception!
Reviews.Author: Herbert D. Richards
Reviews.Content: I took a chance and bought this tv at a reduced price knowing it had some defect. Turns out that the defect is on manual adjustment of the back light control. Back light can only be set using the picture wizard feature of the tv. I have no issues with that as the picture wizard does everything for you to present a quality picture. Overall,this tv is really nice for the price paid. I would do it again if I needed another tv.

Reviews.Title: Price was Right.
Reviews.Author: Terri Yeck
Reviews.Content: It is a TV.  If you are not looking at it straight on the colors become distorted.  When watching on HD there is no difference.

Reviews.Title: LG Electronic TV Set Model LN530042LN5300 42-inch Led 1080p
Reviews.Author: Melvyn M. Ogino
Reviews.Content: As a whole I like the product.  The Owners Manuel has to be more user Friendly, especially so in the Use of the Remote.  I do not like the Color of the Frame which is Black.  A Dark Frame makes the Connections to the Television Set Harder to See and the Labels to the Connection Harder to Read.  The Frame should be a Lighter in Color.  The Same goes for the Remote Control.

Reviews.Title: good TV ,LOW price
Reviews.Author: riverand
Reviews.Content: can't find any 1080PTV under $350,this is you best choice,easy to use ,perfect to my ps3,watch movie is good .

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: ARCD "ARCD"
Reviews.Content: Very good for a second bedroom. I use it in my afternoon nap bedroom where I watch what I want. It is perfect.

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: I bought this because the price was great for a 42" and Amazon had it with 24 months interest free financing. I just wanted a decent tv for my bedroom so I did not want something expensive with 3D or any other fancy features. When the TV arrived I was a little upset; UPs did not bother ringing my doorbell or at least knock to let me know this giant TV box was on my front porch for everyone to see since it does not come shipped in a brown box. (fortunately I was home waiting for it and I have a motion sensor by my front door to alert me when someone is there.) Then I pick up the box and one side of it was completely wet. It had been raining that day but my porch was dry and it was not raining when the UPs driver took it from the truck to my doorstep. My only guess is that it was partially sticking out of a door somewhere on a truck and rain got to it. When I opened it the TV itself appeared to be dry since there is a tick lay of styrofoam protecting it.I already had a LG blu ray player and I was surprised the remote worked with this TV so that was an added plus. My only complaint is there is a slightly noticeable edge around the border of the screen; mainly noticeable when the image is a solid color. I'm not sure what the term is, backlight bleeding or uniformity but there is a noticeable border around the edge of the screen.

Reviews.Title: i like it.
Reviews.Author: Woo H. Choi "Decap"
Reviews.Content: get a chrome cast and it will turn it in to smart tv. its cheap and has high resolution, what can you ask for more.

Reviews.Title: Perfect picture
Reviews.Author: business atlanta
Reviews.Content: This is my second purchase of this model. One from QVC. 649 bucks30 days later Walmart wanted 460, so amazon got the deal.Great slim line tv with a very bright picture

Reviews.Title: Great deal for $$
Reviews.Author: daune
Reviews.Content: Shipped quickly, packaged carefully.  Easy assembly.  The picture is excellent.  Really happy with the TV for the price.  We have it set up to Wii and Xbox.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: After reading some of the other reviews, I must admit, I was a little hesitant to pull the trigger on this TV, and so far, I'm very happy that I did. The picture is fantastic and the sound, for my needs, is completely acceptable. I have this 42 inch TV's big brother in my family room and this one is perfect for our den. Easy to set up. Easy to configure a great picture, and so far, no problems with the TV going off on its own intermittently. I would highly recommend this TV to anyone looking for a decent sized TV without all the bells and whistles.

Reviews.Title: The best TV ever!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is by far the a great TV for its price. It has everything I need and the quality is excellent

Reviews.Title: Fantastic LG 32-Inch 1080 P TV
Reviews.Author: James D Hamby
Reviews.Content: It is everything I wanted and needed... So much that I bought 2 of them.Very happy with the clarity!

Reviews.Title: Great Quality, Great Sound, Perfect TV
Reviews.Author: Jhonny
Reviews.Content: This TV is a basic excelent TV, the quality is so GREAT! and the black balance is the best I've ever seen, the dark scenes are really black, not gray like the others TV's. The sound is very good, and the brightness of the display is perfect, and also can adapt to light conditions in the room.I bought this TV 3 months ago, and I'm so happy enjoying it in my room, here in Venezuela, It has 2 HDMI, 1 USB (that only reproduce photos, not videos, this I already knew), an antenna input, and RCA's inputs and outputs.luck buying this TV, and enjoy it!!!

Reviews.Title: Lg Is The Best
Reviews.Author: David Harris
Reviews.Content: Excellent purchase LG makes the products especially there televisions the copper wire technology in making televisions is superb quality..Now to buy our next LG t.v.

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: Paul Little
Reviews.Content: We used it for a raffle prize. Was very popular. Good looking and working tv with great color. Size is perfect for second tv.

Reviews.Title: LG 32LN5300 32in 1080P LED TV
Reviews.Author: Empiror22
Reviews.Content: I got this for my sons room, he is a casual gamer xbox 360 ps3, watches TV (thur chrome cast /cable (formerly)/ amazon firetv).  So far the tv and been great.  the cost to operate the tv is much let then the westinghouse we had in his room before.  I can say if we need a small TV in this size i will probably buy another.Pros: Great price / for performance.Cons: none

Reviews.Title: Pretty nice
Reviews.Author: Dagger One Bravo
Reviews.Content: The picture is great but the screen has an awful problem with glare. Might not want to put it anywhere that the sun is going to cause any sort of screen reflection.The speakers suck but I expected this.The remote is as basic as it gets.No headphone jack for whatever difference that makes to you but it does have 2 HDMI and 2 USB ports. Sadly, no VGA jack that even my old Insignia (Best Buy store brand) had so if you want to use it for a gaming monitor or something you will need HDMI cables and or VGA adapters.

Reviews.Title: LOVE it to the moon and back
Reviews.Author: Chips
Reviews.Content: I opted for this TV instead of a smart tv because I was going to use it with Roku anyway.  I didn't foresee myself wanting to surf the internet or skype through it so the Smart TV options would not be beneficial for me.The TV delivers a crisp picture, great colors and the sound is more than enough.  I thought I would need to purchase extra speakers but after testing the TV out, I cancelled the speakers I originally bought.The stand is a bit flimsy even with all screws tightened, but hey what can you do when you're balancing a hunk of metal on plastic?  I will be mounting mine to the wall anyway so this is ok for now.One gripe: There are only 2 HDMI ports (one doubles as an MHL port) and moving forward I can see myself needing more than 2 HDMI ports.  Otherwise a great product for the value.

Reviews.Title: Best choice for us
Reviews.Author: Abhi
Reviews.Content: In TV I can say no one can beat LG , Feature which LG gives in lower price you won't find in other brand.I am using this TV from past 5 month. ITs fantastic  Awesome  ....no match.

Reviews.Title: Nice product for a good price
Reviews.Author: LifeIsShort "Civility?Wherediditgo?"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my DH for his birthday. He has a giant screen but we wanted something that wasn't obtrusive in the living room. The picture is clear and the colors are true. I like that it does not take up much space.

Reviews.Title: Good quality TV
Reviews.Author: J. Grunder "Buddha"
Reviews.Content: Second LG unit for our school.  Using these in a private office, so the cost was a factor.  Having VGA port would be nice for older laptops.

Reviews.Title: Nice n Slim
Reviews.Author: Rajkumar Ghosh
Reviews.Content: Very Nice and Slim HDTV. If you are looking for a non-smart TV, it is one of the best option. The Picture quality is awesome. I bring this TV to India. It is working fine with HD Set top box.

Reviews.Title: perefect
Reviews.Author: Nancy Morgan
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV for my in laws.  Its is perfect, perfect size and great picture.  Delivered on time and on tact.

Reviews.Title: High quality and clear picture
Reviews.Author: Kara Brown
Reviews.Content: The television was packaged well, but you will need a screw driver if you put it on the stand. The picture is clear and the sound is good. Overall, no complaints!

Reviews.Title: Loving it
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: We have this TV on a covered outside patio and the picture is great. The TV was light weight so was easy to wall mount hang.

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture!
Reviews.Author: John T. Eshleman "John E"
Reviews.Content: I decided it was time to upgrade to 1080p so I could get the most out of my bluray movies in my room. LG takes 1080p to a whole new level. My 42" Vizio 1080p TV downstairs isn't half as good as this TV. And it's priced nicely for how good it is. I haven't tried using the TV's speakers as I have an Onkyo system in my room but I've heard they aren't so good. Besides, with picture quality this good, you're going to want the sound to match. I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Good price for basic TV
Reviews.Author: D. Matheny
Reviews.Content: I know this isn't a typical usage; but, we picked up a couple of these to use as security monitors in our store.  We were looking for a good size/price ratio - and these seemed to fit the bill perfectly.Now that we've been using them for a while, I have to say that the quality is very good and they seem reliable.  We run 8 HD video feeds to them and it's easy to track what's going on different parts of the store.Overall, I would recommend this if you're looking for a great price on a nice LED TV.

Reviews.Title: Very nice HD TV.
Reviews.Author: D. Navarre
Reviews.Content: I bought this LG TV (39") to replace an LG (32") TV. The picture quality is excellent on the HD channels but is not very good on non HD channels. I just have a basic cable package so I only get 7 HD channels. I think part of the problem is since the screen is bigger then my previous TV, I notice the distortion more. If you have a good cables package I'm sure this would be a great TV for you. The one thing I liked when I read the manual online was that the remote has a Favorite button. On my previous LG TV the Fav button would take you to the next favorite channel each time you pressed it. With this TV when you press the Fav button it takes you to a list of your favorite channels and you have to scroll to the channel you want. Just a little annoyance but better then TVs with no favorite button. LG makes a great quality TV, and I have use 3 of them for the last few years.

Reviews.Title: lg tv
Reviews.Author: Marla Garrason
Reviews.Content: I simply love this tv, I have had no trouble, the picture is stunning, works well in a smaller bedroom, or just for gaming, I would definitely recommend this tv, and you can't beat the price. Plus the two day shipping is great

Reviews.Title: Very good TV
Reviews.Author: Minoesje
Reviews.Content: I am picky but this was a good buy. The HD picture is fantastic, and the sound is also very good, which has been the main reason for prior returns of other TVs. Very natural on this one. The only criticism one can have is that it seems that the picture color can not be manually adjusted, but offers limited options such as "vivid", "standard", etc. Same for sound choices. Overall though very pleased with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Greeat TV
Reviews.Author: Layne Barber "Layne"
Reviews.Content: This was perfect for the bedroom. GREAT picture. No issues! Hooked it right up via HDMI to my DTV Genie w/o any problems.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV!
Reviews.Author: Diane C.
Reviews.Content: Great TV! Great sound and color. Came on time. Definitely a good but. Reasonable price. Easy to install. I recommend  it.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Cody Dean Grice
Reviews.Content: The only thing that would make this tv better is if it came with a huge surround sound system for free

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: RJ_TM3 "Rambunctious Jo"
Reviews.Content: I'm loving this tv, HD is freakin awesome on this tv and the value for money is great its cheap and great quality. I'm not a tv tech or tv savvy but it has everything I look for in a tv. Nice picture, great quality, great sound, screen options like (cinema, dynamic, gaming etc) so you can choose the setting that you like.

Reviews.Title: It works, it's good
Reviews.Author: John Hardin
Reviews.Content: All I wanted was a cheap TV for watching movies and shows, no gaming or anything like that.  I got what I wanted, it's good!

Reviews.Title: Great picture after tweeking
Reviews.Author: Kranki
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the picture but had to make a few adjustments to get the picture that meets my eye.  We're on Direct TV and are very happy with the picture but the sound could be better.  Not sure why any of the manufacturers haven't added a sound bar.  That would make for the best.........................

Reviews.Title: Missing auto-off function!
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: Very good value.  Speakers sound like they belong on a low cost TV which is fits the price, but the quality of the picture exceeds expectations.  I'd give it 5 stars but for one very anoying missing feature:  Instead of shutting off or going into low power mode when there is not input signal, the set constantly displays a message stating the obvious.  This is a terible waste of power and very bright and anoying in a dark room after the program source has been shut off.  At the very least, there should be a menu option to enable auto-power-off.  There is no excuse for missing this critical feature.  The microprocessor inside obviously detects that there is nothing to display so it could easilly turn off after a few seconds.  Especially anoying in a TV which claims to be power saving.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: sultan lee
Reviews.Content: Amazing tv !! Easy to set up beautiful 1080p hd picture worth ur money the best price u can get got it for 384$ and in stores its 500$ get it from electronic express

Reviews.Title: I use it as a PC moniter
Reviews.Author: R. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Works very well.  Not quite as good as the old 1080P Westinghouses or of course the new 4K tvs, but better than even the most premium tvs.  I read reviews online first from folks that particularly wants a PC monitor, and not use as a TV.

Reviews.Title: Great as anticipated
Reviews.Author: Charles Adkins
Reviews.Content: In the world of large televisions I feel as though 39" is smaller than expected, but millions don't have a tv so I have nothing to complain about.  Clear image, good sound, clean with no issues.

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: Jorge C.
Reviews.Content: My their LG product awesome picture, good sound and very easy to set up.The HD quality is excellent.Definitely I recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great T.V. for a great price
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I bought the T.V. about five months ago solely because it was on sale and it greatly exceeded my expectations.  I also own the LG 42" Smart T.V., which is a few hundred dollars more and the picture quality is identical.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: Kathy D. Wolf "MEMEMAY"
Reviews.Content: my mother in law and brother in law had one so I thought why not I bought another brand and it was awful this tv is worth  every penny it has a very clear picture and the volume beats most of the TV's on the market where you have to have a sound bar I have one but do not know if I will need, my other tv has a sound bar because it needs it the volume is terrible

Reviews.Title: Very happy with my choice
Reviews.Author: J. Perry "Zak"
Reviews.Content: I went to some sights and found settings for this tv. I used those settings and am very happy with my choice. TV looks good.

Reviews.Title: Great TV and an even better buy
Reviews.Author: tom ebner
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price.  Perfect for a bedroom.  Picture is very good and the fact that it is not a smart TV is a bonus.  Much easier to upgrade external add ons than to rely on a built in smart function.  Would highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Love this HDTV
Reviews.Author: E. Vincent
Reviews.Content: I have been using the LG 5300 for about a week now - I love it.  Good price point, the picture is great, sound is average, controls are very good, and set up was easy.  I needed a decent size screen for my home office.  I trade the markets for a living, and so I needed the option of connecting a PC to this screen during the trading day.  It works great for that purpose.  I also have a Roku and a cable modem connected to watch movies and access other online content.I would emphasize that this TV has a VERY pretty picture for a lowered priced HDTV.  That is why I like it so much.  I would add that I did not find a better price than Amazon (anywhere).  Delivery was also very fast as promised (2 days).

Reviews.Title: My issues were solved
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: I bought a used one with happy results. The bag that had the remote in it was ripped open without a remote, but Amazon took care of it right away, so 4 stars. It was cosmetically just as described, the sound is fantastic, and the picture is great.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful LED TV
Reviews.Author: Neat_Stuff
Reviews.Content: After many months of shopping for an LED TV the LG 42LN5300 caught my attention. I design medical products for a living and am on a CAD system all day and, therefore, am really picky about my computer displays. However, although this is a 60Hz television, quite frankly, I couldn't tell the difference between this and 120Hz TV's setting right next to it. It just has a lovely picture. Honestly, to do much better I feel I'd have to get up into the $2000 range for those are the only other TVs that caught my eye. The software for this is also extremely intuitive and has a nice selection of presets to choose from - or you can create your own customized settings. The nice thing is that, as soon as you select an option in the menu, you immediately see the change on the screen right behind the menu. No need to select 'ok' and exit the menu to see the results of the menu selections. Love it! I also have an LG front loading washing machine. Both the TV and the washer give you a sense that the engineers at LG really thought the machines and software through before committing the products to market. In general, I am very pleased with LG products - and love my new TV!

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: arkie nan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this set for my bedroom so I was looking for a bargain, not a duplicate of the expensive, high-quality set in my living area. Well, this TV far exceeded my expectations.....and the low price was just icing on the cake. If i ever need another for the guest bedroom, I will probably be buying this one again, Highly recommended!!!

Reviews.Title: My new desktop monitor
Reviews.Author: Nunja Business
Reviews.Content: Love it, the 1920X1080 resolution is just right for my main desktop at work. Takes up little desk space and looks just right from 2 feet away in my chair. Everything is clear and readable with very few issues.

Reviews.Title: 42" tv LG
Reviews.Author: Lori A Webb
Reviews.Content: I love our updated tv! We can hear everything a lot better than our old tv. It was extremely easy to set up. I did it all by myself. The picture is very clear. I would definitely purchase another one in the future!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: D. Swan
Reviews.Content: This is TV has an amazing picture and sound! Hooked up a new Fire TV to it to make it a smart TV and its exceeded expectations. 60Hz TVs with no gimmicky "picture smoothing" is the way to go. You can't go wrong with this set-up.

Reviews.Title: It's a great set
Reviews.Author: D. Bedell "Dasher"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this on behalf of a friend who doesn't have a computer.  This is really an excellent TV.It gives a great picture and good sound and everything works just as it should.  It was no problemto set up.

Reviews.Title: Solid option for the bedroom
Reviews.Author: S. Lim
Reviews.Content: It was not compatible with a brand new Apple TV for some reason. Even had LG tech come out and check/replace HDMI input. Did some online search and looks like fairly common issue with LG. Good thing I didn't pay for the Apple TV, otherwise it would be much lower rating. Ordered a Roku 3 and works flawlessly and loving it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent television for the price.
Reviews.Author: Winfield S. Wilson
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit to replace an RCA tv that I had, which was starting to have picture issues. The LG arrived promptly, and assembly and setup were very easy. Picture and sound are very good. I live in a small, 1 BR apartment, so I don't really need a bigger tv. This LG works perfectly with my dish, and with my blu-ray player. I appreciate all the different picture/ratio/sound settings, as I am able to set up the tv just the way I want it.

Reviews.Title: Review summary
Reviews.Author: Lucille Lood
Reviews.Content: This purchase is exactly the product that I expected clear beautiful pictures, good audio just as you sent it that is the way I recieved it,with my satisfaction of my purchases I will most definitely will recommend amazon.com to any and everyone, thank you.  ,

Reviews.Title: Very good TV
Reviews.Author: Clyde
