Reviews.Content: My Vizio HDMI sound died and I got this. It's bigger in the same space because the bezel is smaller. The picture is clear and sharp. It's a tad less saturated in color, but probably more realistic. The down aiming sound is better than I thought it would be, but I still need my subwoofer.I'm happy with it and recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Mom's Tv
Reviews.Author: nancy ganzel
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my 89 year old mother, updating her old bubble TV.Looks and works great for the price!

Reviews.Title: TV  is an A+++....
Reviews.Author: Albert F Pfeifer
Reviews.Content: I would rate the TV  as A+++.... Part of AT&T; System  just the best I have had.  At front door on date stated...

Reviews.Title: Good TV but.....
Reviews.Author: Northside Men's Scorpion
Reviews.Content: I purchase this TV for a friend of mine, and after turning the TV he realise that the TV not support video from flash drive USB stick, if you plug in with PC it will, but from flash drive, also the warranty it's only for US, it's not valid internationally so be mindful about it, otherwise the TV have perfect picture and high quality TV

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Sam Lyda
Reviews.Content: Mine was a refurb and the only thing I could tell is someone plugged it in and used the remote.  Brand new other than that.  The only thing I can suggest is to Turn Off the Energy savings.  The LG would look great when I first turned it on then dim, Energy savings was working too well.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: greg
Reviews.Content: Got this for my wife for xmas and she likes it. I think now-a-days 42 inches is pretty small for a family room tv but she wanted this size. Its only got 2 hdmi ports so its a pain to have to switch things around. But its a good tv and looks good.We only use it for movies and tv, I haven't tried any gaming on it.

Reviews.Title: Best picture quality ive ever seen on a tv for along time
Reviews.Author: steven
Reviews.Content: Games and movies look amazing on this tv it has very good black levels and very bright whites. The tv is amazing and once you get the picture looking perfect which isn't that hard. The tv has a picture setup feature that works very well. The motion is smooth with a tiny bit almost unnoticeable blurring. I use this tv for a computer monitor and it works better than my Samsung monitor it replaced. This tv will not disappoint with picture quality and has a lot of features you can tune on it if you are picky about settings.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: Kati
Reviews.Content: I've only had this TV for two weeks, but I'm happy (so far).  Many are reporting issues with turning on/off, but I can't comment on this just yet (and hopefully will never need to!).  Compared to my old TV, which was AWFUL, this one is awesome.  The picture is clear (Dr. Phil never looked so great) and I don't have to turn on the surround sound to hear what's going on.  Maybe because my last TV was so bad, my expectations were low for this one, but I'm happy with this TV for the price.  When I bought it, it was only around $365, which was much lower than the $428 I saw it for at Wal-Mart.The one thing I didn't like about this TV was the available AV hook-ups (which, I admit, is my own fault for not fully researching prior to purchase).  I don't have much in the way of HDMI equipment, but I do have a Wii, a DVD player, and a Roku--all things that require the red/yellow/white cords.  This TV doesn't allow you to hook up all these devices at once (it has two HDMI ports, and I think just one component and one AV port).  I bought a box that turns one AV hook-up into four, so that took care of the problem, but I was disappointed when I first got the TV and had to keep unplugging/plugging in devices to use the Wii or watch movies.Another thing is the time it takes for the TV to turn on.  It seems like it takes longer than normal.  The red light kind of flashes a little bit and then a few seconds later it turns on.  It's long enough that sometimes I get scared that it's NOT going to turn on, but it always does.Hopefully, this TV won't go out like it has for some other reviewers I've seen.  I'll keep my fingers crossed.

Reviews.Title: seems to work pretty good
Reviews.Author: Brandon Mitchell "Airsoft eXXpert"
Reviews.Content: I bought it a week ago and just got it today. It works well. Graphics are good. SOund kinda sucks. and there is no audio output. Just input. that or I cant seem to find it. :)

Reviews.Title: Impressive picture if you win the panel lottery
Reviews.Author: Matt M.
Reviews.Content: I'm really happy with the way colors pop on this display.  It makes my other LCDs look really washed out.  Judging from what I read online, my unit came with the sought after IPS display.  (My model number on the back reads 42LN5300-UB.BUSYLJR)There's very little input lag with this set when you use the right settings.  (Search AVSForum)  I'm coming from a TV that made games that required quick reflexes impossible to play.  With this one I can actually put up a fight on Xbox Live.  I feel much more limited by my skill versus my equipment.I was surprised by the speakers on this thing too.  I live in a one bedroom apartment and this thing has no trouble filling my entire living room with sound.So far, I only have one gripe.  The screws they provide for the stand DID NOT fit in the holes.  I have blisters on my fingers from the torque I had to apply in order to assemble the stand.  Maybe it would have worked better if I had some kind of electric drill, but I don't think that should be necessary.  I couldn't get the supplied screws to screw in all the way.  Luckily, I dug through my junk drawer and found a screw that fit.

Reviews.Title: Buy the extended warranty!
Reviews.Author: Fish Guy
Reviews.Content: I never buy extended warranties, but I sure should have for this clunker - just a plain vanilla T.V. that does nothing especially well, seven months after purchase, it began turning on and off by itself - getting worse and worse until it was un-watchable.  Checking the low star ratings here showed that this is a common problem.  I went online to look for a "fix" but in the end, none of them worked, which means that this T.V. had a fatal power supply failure.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Picture looks great...I was hesitant to change from my old plain non HDTV, but I am glad I did....it is so much clearer

Reviews.Title: MUST GET FOR THE TV FANATIC!!!
Reviews.Author: Anthony j lorenzi
Reviews.Content: Great tv!! Love the picture sound and the way it looks mounted on the wall!!! This set was a great buy as well

Reviews.Title: Awesome Tv
Reviews.Author: Kris
Reviews.Content: The TV comes as advertised but Note it DOES NOT play videos directly from an external hard drive. It only shows pictures and plays music from an external hard drive.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: CVRev
Reviews.Content: I only watch once in a while, so when I get a chance to watch TV then I definitely appreciate the quality that LG offers. Good picture and sound quality :)

Reviews.Title: Good Tv
Reviews.Author: Jeff Jarecki
Reviews.Content: Only had it a few days, but so far, so good.  Good picture, crisp interface with plenty of options. Hoping it lasts a nice long time.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Francis W. Barnard
Reviews.Content: love it it has all the hook ups and two hdmi ports.......i use mine as a table top and not a wall mount

Reviews.Title: Value for Money
Reviews.Author: ANUP MOHAN
Reviews.Content: i purchased TV 6 months back and it is really worth buying and value for money. using both HDMI port and good power saving feature. I was worried about buying a 60hz TV but no trouble what so ever. I have watched cricket, Football and most of musical programs. Adjusted some of my sound settings and is a little better.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: natalie
Reviews.Content: Tv works great! not really much to say about it picture shows great, great size, great price. good buy. b

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Lindzie McDonald
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice tv. Big enough and great quality phonto. Would buy this brand again. I love this tv.

Reviews.Title: flat screen t.v.
Reviews.Author: purpleme
Reviews.Content: we were wanting to upgrade  the size of T.V.it is just what we were looking forand great price

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: David J. Hoek
Reviews.Content: Just a great TV for the price.  We are very happy with it and would recommend it to anyone as a primary set for the den.

Reviews.Title: Happytobeanamazonian
Reviews.Author: Natalie C. Mims
Reviews.Content: Thus far the tv has surpassed my expectations! The picture and sounds are great. Can't get enough of  'Mr&Mrs.Smith;' now!

Reviews.Author: Sade Walters
Reviews.Content: It's great no problems , easy setup just very hard to get the stand on until I put my mound it to the wall but other then that it's fine :)

Reviews.Title: An excellent choice for a TV
Reviews.Author: Clarence B.
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived in perfect condition. I am well satisfied with the quality of the picture and sound. Just the right size for my wife and I.

Reviews.Title: Lg 42" HDTV led
Reviews.Author: Lam Nguyen "Folly"
Reviews.Content: Great 42" tv! Excellent picture quality! Great deal for $329 with prime shipping and no tax! Would recommend to anyone looking a HDTV. Fry's has the 42" tv for $329 and Amazon price match that without hesitation thru amazon chat. I got it for $329 no tax for me and 2 days prime shipping, can't beat that.

Reviews.Title: Good deal.
Reviews.Author: Yuhang yao
Reviews.Content: I purchased it as a open box item for $330 on cyber monday sale. Yet it runs pretty well. I am feeling lucky that its not a lemon.Pros:Right size for bedroom/ Capable enough to partner with PS4/Xbox One to delivery quality HD movie/ Netflix/ Video gaming experience/ Its an LG, Good resell value guaranteed.Cons:Its not a smart TV, no wifi/ It has a USB port, but the TV only plays static picture from it

Reviews.Title: For its price range, excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Bryan M.
Reviews.Content: I got this TV for the extra room in my house. I play my PS3 on it and watch Netflix. HDTV looks great on it too. It is extremely easy to setup yourself and has a lot of extra modes and features.

Reviews.Title: Very competent TV
Reviews.Author: Laurence R.
Reviews.Content: Only missing feature that was not clear on purchase is that USB input cannot decode videos.Only does photos and music. Earlier version of same 32inch LG did have that capability.I understand the need to keep price down, I should have read more closely. Still would have bought for price.

Reviews.Title: Good for gaming and laptop extension
Reviews.Author: Tapas
Reviews.Content: Connects great to mac book and X box 360...:) worth the price...dont forget to get insurance for cheap...only as backup !! ...

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Joseph Boyer
Reviews.Content: Had this t.v. for about two months now and there is not one thing that has gone wrong with it so far. I have it on the stand and not on the wall so idk how good the wall mount is but the stand is pretty good. The only negatives are the controller is a little small so its easy to use and I couldn't find a headphone jack but other than that no complaints at all!

Reviews.Title: Sent a dead TV Replacement was better.
Reviews.Author: Ant1126
Reviews.Content: Tv was dead before I opened the box.I even wasted my time mounting it.Ugh now I wish I would have bought through another retailer so I could have replaced at store and not wasted time with Amazon return.I was sent a replacement and its a great tv.3 stars because of being sent dead tv.=P

Reviews.Title: First time purchase of flat screen
Reviews.Author: Kara J. Liller
Reviews.Content: Great picture, and sound. No more squares on the television. Lg makes good products. We will purchase another. Thanks lg

Reviews.Title: Works great as a computer monitor.
Reviews.Author: Flyboy79
Reviews.Content: I ordered this specifically as a computer monitor to help with database viewing/study and also use it for video games as well. Then I started using it for Netflix viewing. A very nice unit, to say the least! I have been enjoying many hours now and simply stated, as long as you have a computer graphics card that can support an HDMI cable, go for it! You won't be disappointed. The colors are bright and vivid, the screen auto-adjusts well, and the whole unit is surprisingly light weight. If any failures occur, I will post updates. But so far it is running like a champ! Had it for several weeks now. My only warning is that when pulling it out of the box, the static electricity can shock the heck out of you, so watch out. It's been my most shocking (no pun intended) un-boxing yet. Maybe get two people to do it.

Reviews.Title: A nice TV that we got for a good price on sale
Reviews.Author: Misha
Reviews.Content: We got this TV on sale at Amazon at Christmastime. I was also considering a Samsung, but this one had good reviews and the sale price was great. We have had not problems with this TV. We use it for watching programs and movies on Netflix, Amazon Prime, and Hulu Plus (with a BluRay player). We also have an old VCR hooked up to it and have watched things that we had recorded on a DVR when we had cable TV. The picture is very good and the sound is quite adequate for our needs, although I don't turn the volume up loud (no surround sound for me, thanks). I think that this was a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Larry Jones "Blue Pilot"
Reviews.Content: The picture is great, sound OK.  I got it for a good price, and was easy to install.  Everything that I expected.

Reviews.Title: Happy with my second LG TV
Reviews.Author: Freeman P Thurston
Reviews.Content: I never bought a TV from Amazon before but when shopping in stores became a hassle I took the plunge. I took the free shipping so delivery was a little slow but I got it in six days in excellent condition via UPS.I am very satisfied with this TV. I have a bigger LG in the family room and this one is a nice size for our bedroom. Great picture with DirecTV.One note for anybody who uses the buttons on the TV (I don't): they are on the back. Just in from the right edge but they are on the back which I found odd.

Reviews.Title: my led tv
Reviews.Author: Theresa M. Huling
Reviews.Content: I am thoroughly impressed with our new tv, the picture is excellent, sound is great, packaging did a great job of protecting the tv. would recommend this to anyone

Reviews.Title: The Picture Is Great, But Wish It Had Some Features.
Reviews.Author: Gio
Reviews.Content: The picture is really good. The colors are a lot better than other panels. Everything is great but I did find the audio out to be pretty annoying. There is only an Optical-Audio out (no RCA), so I had to buy an extra converter box to plug it in to my audio system. Then after you get it plugged in, the volume controls on the remote still control the internal TV speakers. Regardless, It's still a great product.

Reviews.Title: Pretty nice tv for the price
Reviews.Author: jonathan bretsch
Reviews.Content: After spending about an hour getting my picture set up for the different devices I have hooked up to it, I like this tv quite a bit. The sound quality sucks, but LG realizes, I think, that most people will have their own sound system so why put any money into that and instead put all their money into the picture. Would recommend LG's to anyone I know.

Reviews.Title: LG tv
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Vacchelli
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv as a replacement for a lemon that I had for 4 months before it stopped working (it was an Insignia). I heard that the LG products were a good buy, so I bought one.  What a great TV!  The picture quality is striking. Setting it up was quite easy.  I did a lot of research prior to buying this set and I'm happy that I chose this product.

Reviews.Title: A Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Kayla Harper
Reviews.Content: I love my new TV, its like i'm sitting in an at home movie theater! The sound and picture quality are superb, and I love saying I own this exact one.

Reviews.Title: So so TV not great sound
Reviews.Author: dmofo
Reviews.Content: Product works as advertised. Sound output is on the lightweight side, you must use some type of external speakers for better sound.

Reviews.Title: Prompt service, great TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: Jessica King
Reviews.Content: Received the televisions on time and as described promptly. Picture is great no problems with them so far. Picture is sharp and bright.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Mike Kasberg
Reviews.Content: I got a good price on this TV with an online discount around Christmas. It is a good TV and I haven't had any problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Good price for a larger set
Reviews.Author: Sandy Ganz
Reviews.Content: Overall a good TV, non-smart set which was something I was looking for since I already have a Roku box. The audio setting with digital output are a bit lacking. The newer LG's have better control and settings overall as well as more hdmi inputs.Remote is easy to operate and simpleSandy

Reviews.Title: Great Picture & HDTV for the great price.
Reviews.Author: Joshua Kuzenka
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV and it came promptly.  I had it installed and use it for watching TV and Blue Ray DVDs through my surround sound system.Picture is great and can be modified based on the delivered options through the TV.Great late Christmas present and not to hard on the wallet compared to other TV's out on the market.~ Josh

Reviews.Title: LG LN5300
Reviews.Author: Carl M. Gambino
Reviews.Content: LG has continued to impress me.  I now own 4 different models of the LG LED's and have nothing but raves for their quality and workmanship and technology

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Lynn Edgington
Reviews.Content: We had purchased the LG 49" smart TV and absolutely love it.  When our bedroom TV started acting up on us, this was the logical choice for us.  We wanted a great TV, but did not need the smart TV technology.  The picture is awesome and so is the sound.  We absolutely love our two LG TV's and recommend LG to anyone needing a great TV with a great picture and sound.  Price was also the best we could find.  So a win-win for us all the way around.

Reviews.Title: tv good..
Reviews.Author: J. Hunt
Reviews.Content: Got this to replace a 1st gen Visio that was breaking..  Sharp TV, was a good value..  ?Has the features needed for the room it's in.  If you are looking for a TV that you only need two HD sources plugged into you can't go wrong here.

Reviews.Title: LG 32" LED-lit 1080/60
Reviews.Author: Ellen Klakouski
Reviews.Content: This tv is really nice for my bedroom.  Such a clear picture, nice sound. I really like the thin frame around the edges as it makes the tv look really big =)

Reviews.Title: Just what we needed!
Reviews.Author: L. Conrad "non-athlete"
Reviews.Content: A TV was needed for the bedroom and this one filled the bill completely.  It is used mainly for late night viewing.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: Got this as a gift for my teenage son.  Picture is great and size was perfect for his room.  Wall mounted with ease (using Cheetah mount).  I recommend this TV for a small room or office.

Reviews.Title: It works!
Reviews.Author: Hamilton Brannan
Reviews.Content: The TV  provides a gorgeous picture. Since a member of the family is hearing impaired, we had to find a converter to convert the optical audio outlet to analog so that the "TV Ears" would work.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding picture!
Reviews.Author: Kay Scott
Reviews.Content: This is a fine TV, very sharp image, sound is good when programmed for music or movie (otherwise sounds tinny). The only issue I have with it is that it has no headphone or audio out jacks.  I have had my TV about 8 months.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my son and he loves it. I don't think this size is big enough to have it as family room TV, but for a bedroom or smaller room this TV is great. I was really impressed with the picture quality, that is definitely great! As a con I have to mention that it doesn't have audio out (at least the one we have doesn't). Also the sound quality is nothing to write home about.

Reviews.Title: NICE!
Reviews.Author: Judith A. Thompson "luven2cook"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY NEW LG TV!  GREAT PIC AND SOUND AND VERY GOOD PRICE FOR A 1080DPI.  WILL PURCHASE THIS BRAND AGAIN. AND FROM AMAZON (MY FAVORITE PLACE TO SHOP) IF AVAILABLE.

Reviews.Title: 39" LG TV
Reviews.Author: Linda Derango "fashiongirl"
Reviews.Content: T.V. has a great clear picture and sound fits perfectly where I need it. Would highly recommend. Great price value.

Reviews.Title: fantastic LG quality!
Reviews.Author: Scott Babcock
Reviews.Content: this flatscreen has such a clear picture with HD quality it is fantastic! the big thing is how long it lasts.

Reviews.Title: Nice Television
Reviews.Author: Justin Fowler
Reviews.Content: Affordable for the working college student. Recommended for those looking for their first TV. Light, Easy assemble, nice picture quality

Reviews.Title: A Lot of TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Joyce W Ericson
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV for the price.  The best sound is the virtual surround sound, so go to the settings to make the change when you first go through the setup.  The picture is great!

Reviews.Title: loved it
Reviews.Author: Jay Edwards
Reviews.Content: good clear picture and fits nicely where I want it. Can view from all angles still with clear picture. Would recomend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: good TV for a good price
Reviews.Author: AEskelsen
Reviews.Content: Good condition, bueatiful TV, very decent price and my shipping was free. Can't beat that deal. Its a perfect size for a small room.

Reviews.Title: Wow.
Reviews.Author: Troy W. Isakson
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a smaller TV upstairs.  The colors are brilliant. Lots of picture options for color, darkness, etc.  I am very picky with my picture and was able to tailor it perfectly to what I like.  Also, the sound is impressive.  No need for a soundbar with this TV.  It gets very loud and has very clear audio for any program.  Very impressed.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Kellie Schwacha
Reviews.Content: Have had this for about 2 months now. Works great. Nice big screen, picture and sound is great.Only reason I gave it a 4 instead of a 5 is because I can't plug my DVD player and wii into the tv at the same time. There aren't enough of those plugs in the back of the tv.

Reviews.Title: Price is great
Reviews.Author: matthew arout
Reviews.Content: Price was great image is great, make sure you spend time to manually fine tune the vide, i just found a site with perfect instructions. I also would say be aware speakers work but not going to impress

Reviews.Title: Very good picture
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: The Picture of this TV is great. Sound is decent and it seem it has good build quality. Good buy.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Joseph Heath "georgiajoey"
Reviews.Content: This tv is fantastic out of the box. It looks fantastic in my living room and works great with my sound bar.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture
Reviews.Author: C. Mackey "Cheryl"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product at a reasonable price. I bought it ofr my staff's lounge and they are thrilled.

Reviews.Title: Husbands Dream Come True
Reviews.Author: Emilia Moncur
Reviews.Content: I love this TV at first I was really not sure but since my husband and I were rocking the vintage t.v. You know the one where the remote control is missing the back and you have to use a set of chopsticks to change the channel? Yea you know what I'm talking about. This t.v. of course was a great improvement. Not only is it HD wonderful sound by itself but it comes with everything you need to automatically become a couch potato instantly.You can change the setting of the scale t.v.s screen. It's beautiful for video games. The quality of the t.v. makes even older games like PS2 games and Gamecube games look amazing. We also have a PS3 which is giving an entire new life to all the games we played on our vintage t.v. screen look brand new to us. With the price we saved on buying it here it was amazing. If you can buy it. I'm already thinking about buying 2 more t.v's to put in our bedroom and the other in his office space!! WORTH IT

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV and Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Tony "Tony"
Reviews.Content: I bought the LG LN5300 for use in my bedroom. I'm very satisfied with the picture quality and once I get the HD box from Comcast, I'll then know how good the HD display quality is. Very easy to setup and not problems after a month of use. I bought this during Christmas time frame when Amazon had a nice sale price. So far, so good!  The speakers aren't the best of course, but in my bedroom, the sound is fine for me.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV! would recommend buying.
Reviews.Author: Skye Holiday
Reviews.Content: This TV is big, the quality is top and the sound is amazing. the only thing that it doesn't have going for it is that it doesn't have a headphone jack.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: LeKeisha A. Bostwick
Reviews.Content: This was a good buy, I want to get another one for another room in  my house.  Its the right size, i recommend it the anyone.

Reviews.Title: Fair picture for money
Reviews.Author: Chief Bob
Reviews.Content: Purchased this to replace a Toshiba which had failed twice in four years.  The picture and sound on this TV is not nearly as good as the Toshiba was but hoping it will last longer.  Very disappointed in Toshiba.  First the HDMI input failed so used component input, then the TV failed completely a year later.

Reviews.Title: so far so good with one exception
Reviews.Author: seri
Reviews.Content: So far, I like this TV. The picture quality is pretty good for the price. However, every now and then I notice a little "blip"/ flicker across the bottom of the screen. I am not sure if this is a connection problem (it happens when I am streaming through roku) or if it is a design flaw that will become a bigger problem with the TV. We'll see. I don't have this issue on my samsung led tv.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Irish Lace
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband for our downstairs "project room" (ironing, Wii, gift-wrapping at the holidays - and, well, projects) because some projects are engrossing and some are just boring.It arrived very quickly and well packaged - no damage. It's light enough that we didn't need two men and a crane to get it downstairs and set up (moving the old one was a REAL pain!) Set up went well and, when the picture didn't quite live up to expectations, a call to LG revealed we just needed and HTMI cable. (Duh!) The controls and settings took a bit of time to figure out, but we are extremely pleased. Good TV at a good price.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Size for Bedroom, Sound Configs
Reviews.Author: Chris Aiken
Reviews.Content: TV fit my cabinet with 3 inches to spare. The sound was horrid at first but it took some playing with adjustments to get it closer to what I like. Some shows still sound a little crappy and then others sound awesome...weird. Good TV for the price & location used.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Gloria A. Marsella
Reviews.Content: Easy set up and good picture.  Remote easy to understand.  Very happy with overall appearance and ease of using it.

Reviews.Title: Good value.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "angel322"
Reviews.Content: Great, clear picture for a very reasonable price. It fits the space we had for a TV perfectly. A great buy all round.

Reviews.Title: Great 32 inch
Reviews.Author: WillC
Reviews.Content: Perfect tv, works great, sound is fantastic considering price and size. Have the 62 inch version as well, huge difference, but good considering half the size

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: James M. Murphy
Reviews.Content: TV was very easy to install and wire up to my satellite receiver and DVD player.  Nice picture and very easy to program.

Reviews.Title: A good mid-size HD TV
Reviews.Author: arroncfl91
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to replace an older, larger LG LCD when I moved across the country and couldn't ship it with me (without spending almost the value of said TV to do so).The picture on the unit is great, and actually a step up from my last, as it is LED lit. I use this TV with a Google Chromecast, and have no need to connect it to cable this way.While the overall build quality is nothing special - the screen does not swivel on the stand, the power and volume / channel buttons are rubberized plastic - it does the job it is advertised to do, and will suffice until I can be reunited with my 47-incher.

Reviews.Title: 32 inche screen tv
Reviews.Author: Teresa Richards
Reviews.Content: Only got 4 is because it don't swivel.  Or don't have an attachment for what you want for ur tv. Would like to know before purchase if it has more attachments.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Timothy Alonzo
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with the product and the time in which I received it, it works well and for a very low cost.

Reviews.Title: What a great deal
Reviews.Author: Linda D. Ivell
Reviews.Content: We gave the grandkids a "media room" for Christmas.  You would have thought we had spent $1,000 dollars on them.  At 8 and 9 years old, they were on top of the world.  Amazing value.

Reviews.Title: not completely satisfied
Reviews.Author: DSalas
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because i'm not satisfied with the sound or illumination, it is dull the colors are washed out

Reviews.Title: Worth it for Price
Reviews.Author: Robert Newhouse
Reviews.Content: The picture is great and made it a smart TV, by plugging in Googlechrome to HDMI.I'd recommend buying this TV if you just want basic LED TV

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Barbara Shaffer
Reviews.Content: Yes, the TV is just what I wanted and just what I expected.  Easy to set up, too.  We are enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome LG LED TV!
Reviews.Author: Kate
Reviews.Content: I was looking to buy a 32" inch TV and wanted an LG brand because of their great reviews.  In doing a web search I found the perfect TV at a great price.  Easy set-up, great picture.

Reviews.Title: this works for me
Reviews.Author: dgsavage
Reviews.Content: Purchase this to replace the TV in my bedroom that had stopped working.  It's a good TV, the price makes it a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Kamse85 "Nailkam"
Reviews.Content: Image is crisp, sound is decent and the TV is light but built solidly. It is probably the best, lightest and cheapest TV of that size in the market. That is among the renowned manufacturers.

Reviews.Title: Great TV! I love the viewing experience
Reviews.Author: Yun Ah Lee
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. It arrive the next day, so I LOVE PRIME! It's great quality for the price! You should def purchase it

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: glenn
Reviews.Content: I love this TV, I put it in my bedroom and it's just right. The sound is way way better than I thought it would be and the images are super crisp!

Reviews.Title: great TV
Reviews.Author: Jim Rowan
Reviews.Content: love it!  This has been everything I was looking for.  Quick delivery great designExcellent color excellent sound perfect size

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: nigel defreitas
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv great picture and sound sets up very easy picture quality is excellent I will recommend this tv to anyone

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Gryhndlovr1
Reviews.Content: It met all my expectations that I wanted in a TV.  It was easy to set up.I have it set up with my Bose surround sound and it's great.

Reviews.Title: Works great for my In laws
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey E Fowler
Reviews.Content: Set up was easy, just one small snag came when one of the free over the air channels did not program, still trying to figure that one out.

Reviews.Title: TV QUALITY EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: Frank Gottlieb
Reviews.Content: The TV met all my expectations and was as advertised.  It was easy to install and the picture quality is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Quayle
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of these for my game room.  They have been great and have a great picture.  I shopped around and Amazon beat all competitors by $40  or $50 per LED.

Reviews.Title: Good 'dumb' TV
Reviews.Author: John William Saady
Reviews.Content: This TV is very good for what it is, a barebones hdtv. I have this set up in my bedroom and the quality is phenomenal. I have OTA channels and an Xbox One, and no matter what I put on, the quality is great. The only downside I can think of is that there is only a toslink audio output, so a converter box is necessary if your speakers don't have a toslink input.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: ia_hwks "Go Hawks!"
Reviews.Content: This TV is perfect for my needs.  It's a high quality unit I got for a great price.  The item shipped quickly and arrived safely in it's well packaged factory box.  If you are looking for a TV and don't require internet options (I get them from a PS3) this is a great choice.  I also often use this TV as a computer monitor and it looks great.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: RopinTrevor
Reviews.Content: Just what I wanted in my bedroom. No issues, works great, looks great, sounds great! Thank you LG and thank you Amazon...well done!!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Paul Reichl
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup. Nice picture and excellent sound. This is the second LG TV I have (the other is a 32") and both are good quality products.

Reviews.Title: Got my brand new LG TV?
Reviews.Author: tdlivings
Reviews.Content: Unpacked it and ready to put it together. remote...Check...batteries...check...Power cord...power cord?? where in the heck is the power cord?Nice TV should last a lifetime considering I can't plug it in.Update: Called the free tech support by amazon. They are sending me a free power cord. OK, nothing is perfect but customer service makes the difference.Amazon Rocks!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Matthew Schultz
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my parents for christmas. Love prime, as I got it in two days. This tv is perfect for them.

Reviews.Title: Love my New TV
Reviews.Author: M. S. Crane
Reviews.Content: So, perhaps most flat screen LED-lit TV's are the same and I haven't had enough experience with them all to know the difference but I will say I am quite happy with this one. Sharp, clear and awesome. I just hooked up a PS3 and watched my first Blu-ray movie on it and wow - really nice picture!

Reviews.Title: Run!!!
Reviews.Author: Kathy Hughes
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my son for Christmas. It was broken and wouldn't power up from the start. A repair person is scheduled to come out and fix it. The repair person said he was staying busy fixing these TVs.  Very, very disappointing. I feel totally ripped off after buying this piece of s***

Reviews.Title: Nothing special about this . Just good value and decent picture.
Reviews.Author: Saratoga Cyber Sales
Reviews.Content: As said this is a good basic HD tv and a good value. Pay a little and get more than you might expect.  I like it.

Reviews.Title: GOOD THINGS COME IN SMALL PACKAGES
Reviews.Author: MICHAEL C.
Reviews.Content: Incredible easy set-up, excellent picture quality, sound, design, highly rated and fits nicely on the wall of my bedroom 12 x12 space.A full 1080p viewing, with 60Hz and 32inches is the perfect size. LED-lit is the way to go if you need a great television.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Ryanne Brown
Reviews.Content: I chose the rating I did because overall, I think this is a good TV. It was easy to assemble, easy to operate and the picture is clear, even without the HD turned on. The only thing is that the sound takes some getting used to. If you're used to having a soundbar or just better TV sound, then you might be a little disappointed. Other than that, I am really happy with my purchase and would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Nick Klaudt
Reviews.Content: LG and Amazon teamed up to make our upgrade from an old tube TV to this 21st century TV a smooth transition.  We are in the process of watching our old movies and seeing thins we had missed earlier.Easy setup and easy to use

Reviews.Title: Not a bright picture, poor resolution
Reviews.Author: Robert Taylor "realproperty"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace an old 26" tube set. I wish I had never done it. The picture quality is not bright. The resolution is poor at best.  I bought this because I have a 52" LG in my den and love it. I kept the box and plan to send this one back.

Reviews.Title: Great price, great picture
Reviews.Author: motorcrash
Reviews.Content: We bought this as a second TV for a great price around the holidays.  Picture is great out of the box.  Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Michele A. Crawford
Reviews.Content: Much better than box TV. Sharp image and easy to see. Works good even though it is refurbished. Is the same as getting a new TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent delivery time and excellent customer service.
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: The LG television for the price was what I expected.  I would rate the quality about 5 out of 10.  In order to get the sound to be clear you must purchase additional speaker to attach.  Customer Service was excellent with Amazon and it is no wonder why they are doing so well.  Thank you for working with me on the delivery time with UPS.Randy Jenkins

Reviews.Title: Great TV Great Price
Reviews.Author: Renee Stanton
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with this TV. The setup was super easy. The picture is fantastic. I was pleasantly surprised that even on the non-HD channels (I have xfinity cable), the picture is much better then my previous HD TV set (a visio brand). Out of thebox, the sound was a little tinny for my taste, but I easily found and adjusted the settings to improve the sound. You can't beat this TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: J. bowers
Reviews.Content: Arrived really quickly and we have really enjoyed it. Nice clear picture and quality, a great TV and a super gift for xmas!

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: M.J. Mundy
Reviews.Content: Great tv...nice bright clear picture. Great value. LG products are always great. Sound could be slightly better but it's a good deal for the price!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a television set
Reviews.Author: Richard edwards
Reviews.Content: Purchased this as a replacement for my parents old CRT.  For a TV this was perfect, it does not have all the bells and whistles as the "smart" televisions.  But for a TV this was perfect for them.

Reviews.Title: fantastic
Reviews.Author: jeanrn
Reviews.Content: I love my new TV.  It arrived on time and was exactly what was advertised.  Great value, good picture, easy to set up and connect to everything.

Reviews.Title: Great for use as a monitor
Reviews.Author: Adam Bansley "Adam Bansley"
Reviews.Content: Bought this to use a monitor for a mac mini. Works well and looks great. No complaints. Had it about two months and no troubles so far.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: jambacute
Reviews.Content: Great for a starting TV it fit well into my room and it does not take over space. screen quality is the best. I cant wait till I play my video games on it.

Reviews.Title: LG 42LN5300 Give it more than 5 stars
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This tv arrived in perfect condition.The picture on this tv is fantastic. It con't be any better.The sound is good and it works for me.This is the best tv I have ever owned. I hope it performs this good long term.Amazon did a great job with this whole transaction.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jeanne M. Fivash
Reviews.Content: This tv is great and a wonderful price. Checked around before we purchased it and it was best price.  Love it

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: David E Hart
Reviews.Content: Glad I bought this. Easy to set up, easy to operate. I've owned LG previously and have had good experience with the product.

Reviews.Title: Review of LG 32 in TV
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: The LG 32 inch LED TV has a great quality picture.  The price was right too.  I found the TV easy to program.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value / Good Design
Reviews.Author: Goldrush
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this purchase -- just what I was looking for -- good picture / sound -- w/o 3D or Smart Features at a good price.  Setup was easy -- about 15 minutes to unpack (this 39" version is not heavy -- 1 person job) and attach TV to Base, then about another 15 minutes to customize settings and program Directv Remote.  I changed the picture from Eco to Standard -- looked more natural to me, w/o the punch of the Vivid setting.  The picture is very good, and I did not detect any motion issues while watching a basketball game.  There are only 2 HDMI outputs which was OK for my purposes (Directv and BluRay); OK for a guest room.  If you need to add an Apple TV / and / or a Game Console, you really need more than 2 HDMI's -- look elsewhere.  Seems to be very good quality / performance for the price.

Reviews.Title: A Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Toby Martin II (aka R. Howe) "rchowe"
Reviews.Content: This LG 32-inch TV was purchased for our dining room/kitchen area.  We haven't had it long, but it fits in fine, and the quality of the 1080 pictures are excellent!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Fedler
Reviews.Content: There's no problem with the tv, the settings in the menu are great, just a bonus to a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Excellent !
Reviews.Author: capekat
Reviews.Content: My son got this TV as a replacement and upgrade!  He loves it!  Clear picture and very well priced!  Shipped safely and on time.  Super happy.

Reviews.Title: New LED experience.
Reviews.Author: Douglas Lott
Reviews.Content: Very good LED TV for the money.  I didn't realize the narrow viewing angle would present  a problem in a larger room.  My previous flat screens was a plazma. I would look for a plasma next time.

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: merle
Reviews.Content: Excellent, no problems. Easy  to set up, the picture is clear, and my vios remote connected easily.that's all folks bye

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Roy A Fullerton
Reviews.Content: 5 Stars for Picture, Color and Energy consumption.4 Stars for Blacks and Motion Blur.3 Stars for Sound and Skimpy Inputs/Outputs. Needs a Headphone and Speaker (Amp) Output.Great picture overall, yes, 1080p does make a difference. But, compared with a plasma, movies with a lot of dark scenes (Blacks), are hard to see (watch?), and I can always see a kicked football, but a Tom Brady snap can be hard to follow (motion blur).The sound is average for a flat screen (fair for an audiophile). And why is there no headphone jack on a set that's marketed for a bedroom?This set has a 10 watt RMS per channel audio amp, and only an optical audio output. A pair of RCA speaker, or mini pin stereo, jack(s) would make it easy to add a pair of basic bookshelf speakers (making it easy to overcome the size limitations of the built in speakers).

Reviews.Title: Good to Go
Reviews.Author: Britt
Reviews.Content: Day three of my LG 42” 5300.  So far so good.  Picture is crystal clear great. I gave it a 5 star rating but I’d give it a 4.5, if that rating was available.  This is because the base is frustrating to assemble (at least for me).  Wish it had 3 HMDI, instead if two.  Finally, my wireless headphones cannot be plugged into the TV (have to use the cable box instead).  The one unexpected nice surprise is that the 42” screen seems much bigger than my 40” screen.  I'd gladly recommend this to a friend .

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: JP Morgan
Reviews.Content: Huge value with this TV.  Great picture and sound.  I Highly recommend this LG TV. You can't go wrong with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV FOR THE PRICE!!
Reviews.Author: Todd M. Montgomery
Reviews.Content: Have had this TV for 8 days now.  My wife is recovering from knee surgery.  The TV has been on 18 hours a day.  We have an LG 720p.  I would say the 1080 is a better picture.  Picture really is amazing.  We have no problem with the sound either.  It's a bedroom TV and is plenty loud for that purpose.  We do not even come close to putting it on max volume. I guess if you were wanting surround sound for movies you would be disappointed.  For normal sound,  this is fine.  We are very pleased with this purchase.  Price was $269.  So price was excellent and TV is great.  Have not had that issue with TV going on and off.  Use sleep timer at night and works.  Will update if it becomes a problem later.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Ben Welch
Reviews.Content: Great television for the price. I have always been impressed with LG products. This set is replacing a Westinghouse that died after 9 years of use.

Reviews.Title: Looks great
Reviews.Author: OBX Dude "Obx dude"
Reviews.Content: Looks great, good price, and delivered as promised. Small bezel around the screen, helps it fit in a tight spot.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: Michael E.
Reviews.Content: Our old 32" backup TV finally went bad and wanted to get something that was not expensive but had 1080p...I personally am a big fan of LG and this TV lived up to my expectations...color is great, picture quality is great, weight and price are great...it probably won't be the greatest TV you ever buy but I doubt you can find a better price/quality ratio.

Reviews.Title: Was Great While it Lasted
Reviews.Author: Karyn E. Everett
Reviews.Content: I am one of the unlucky ones.  When we got the TV i was thrilled with the fantastic picture and the clear voice feature to make the conversation louder without increasing the background noise.  This is a bedroom tv used mostly for me to fall asleep to at night to droning voices and for my daughter to watch in the morning for a few minutes.  On the 32nd day of ownership we noticed despite setting the sleep timer that the tv was on in the middle of the night.  On day 34 it would not turn on with either the remote or the button on the tv.  My husband came upstairs a little later and it was on.  That same night, the tv was randomly cycling on and off and would not stay on very long.  The standby light on the tv would flash on and off for a few minutes, then it would go off and the tv would come on, and just when I was settling in to fall asleep it would go off again.  Starting to drift asleep, on it would come, disturbing me again.  I had to wait for it to stay on long enough to track down the remote in the dark and turn it off.  Unlikely the store will take it back 4 days after the return policy expired but I am going to try.  Otherwise it is a lesson learned, don't buy LG and get the protection coverage even on a bedroom tv.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Hold Fast
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the money.  We recently replaced our outdoor TV with LG electronics LN5300, and it looks great.  Awesome picture.  Only downside like all the flatscreens is lack of speakers but thats what you get with all new TVs

Reviews.Title: Good quality for cost
Reviews.Author: Dmitrifan
Reviews.Content: Great quality and easy set up. We purchased to use for streaming video. We had it set up very quickly and were very impressed with the clarity of the picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: Can't go wrong with this one.
Reviews.Author: Tony Sewell
Reviews.Content: Great television at a so affordable price.  The perfect tv for my bedroom.  Crisp, clear and vibrant picture.  I would buy it again and again.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: J. Childs
Reviews.Content: Beautiful Picture!  I only needed a basic TV without all the added technology 'bells and whistles', and this one is just what I wanted!!  It was easy to assemble and  I could not ask for a clearer picture.

Reviews.Title: tv is great
Reviews.Author: Dee Miller
Reviews.Content: i am very pleased with my new tv.  everything works great, the picture is great, and it was an easy setup.thanks lg

Reviews.Title: Well, it is my first HD TV but the picture is gorgeous
Reviews.Author: Hollywood Charles
Reviews.Content: This TV has a beautiful picture.  I can't say enough about it.The sound, as posted, is average to below average. It's disappointing that the only audio out is digital.  I just want to hook up a couple of crappy speakers, where am I going to get cheap digital input speakers?  I don't even think I've ever seen one.Inputs are below average - there are only two HDMI inputs, which got used up FAST (cable box, BluRay) - but one of the inputs is in the back and one is on the SIDE.  VERY clunky.That's about it.  It's hanging on the wall now on a swivel, and I'm trying to navigate the world of HD sources versus standard sources.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Dana c Latimore-Parks
Reviews.Content: This is a great television for the price. The resolution is clear, sound is exceptional, i'm looking to replace one more tv in my home I will be going with a LG LED.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV- great price!
Reviews.Author: Sandra Folgers
Reviews.Content: Purchased this 32" LG from Amazon to replace an older Samsung that had died.  we have an LG 55" in our family room, so I was quite familiar with the quality and picture of LG.  Flawlessly hooked up in bedroom- great picture, sound OK for this type of a setup.Granted, it's only been a few days, but couldn't be more pleased.  Considering that this TV cost about 75% less than the original  720p Samsung,  I'd say I made a good decision.

Reviews.Title: Tv
Reviews.Author: ellen ford
Reviews.Content: Love the TV....it is in our bedroom.....so far we have had no problems at all ....hopefully this will remain the case....Thanks Amazon for having great merchandise...

Reviews.Title: LG LED TV
Reviews.Author: Shelley
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with it, it is a good size for my bedroom. The TV is wall mounted, and it has a good picture.

Reviews.Title: LG LN 5300 42 inch LED
Reviews.Author: Richard J. Cotter
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV,very pleased with overall performance.I was reluctant to purchase TV from Amazon, as i have hadno prior problems re damages to anything i have purchasedi decided to take a chance.TV arrived on time,no damages,nicely packed,plenty of protection in packing.Set up was very easy.Very happy with purchase.

Reviews.Title: We Love It!
Reviews.Author: Kimberli
Reviews.Content: We love our new TV! My husband more so because he gets to watch his ESPN in good quality! Love it!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: I paid about $450 for this a few weeks ago. I was hesitant at first, but LG has always done me good in terms of quality.I was not let down. The TV performs very well - the picture is crisp and clear, the on-board software is easy to navigate, and, best of all, it handles the PS3 just fine.On my previous TV (an Element *shudder*) fast movements and animations would blur and distort on the screen. That is not the case with this LG. Movies, games, both streaming and otherwise, work perfectly. I have zero complaints so far.Will update if something horrible happens.

Reviews.Title: Seems like a good tv
Reviews.Author: Aimee Farrell
Reviews.Content: .No complaints. I haven't used it much, but so far so good. The picture looks clear and The sound is great. I have had to go into settings and change the audio setting and the picture setting a few times, but it was easy enough to figure out.

Reviews.Title: What we needed!
Reviews.Author: Geo3
Reviews.Content: We required an HDTV that would comfortably fit our television hutch and would also our limited budget. The LG 39" TV meets both of these requirements nicely. Very good color and sound; it's an HDTV that easily provides the basics for a reasonable price. We're please with it and would recommend this TV to all but the 'bells and whistles' crowd!

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Luiza N. G. Henry
Reviews.Content: Really great cost x value!! The image is really good and clear!! Would definitely recommend it! Haven't use it for too long so not sure about durability but so far so good!

Reviews.Title: Get you one!
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Byrdo
Reviews.Content: Crisp clear picture and great sound. I've had another LG tv before and love it. Top quality tv and I would suggest them to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product!
Reviews.Author: Dozer
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical due to the low price but the tv is a high quality led tv. Seems a little dim, not really a big deal tho. Looks great mounted on the wall. Impressively light at 19.5 pounds with no stand.

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: Misty
Reviews.Content: The LG TV we bought is a great buy. The size is perfect in our bedroom & the picture has sharp color. I really like the esthetics (appearance) of the frame & stand. Considering purchasing another one from Amazon.com.

Reviews.Title: excellent!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Leonardo Sanchez
Reviews.Content: great design...fantastic image quality and clarity...easy lifting...easy operation...i recommented...i actually buy two for my parents and they love it....LG is my favorite brand...super durable...

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Phillip
Reviews.Content: for the money this is a great tv, easy to operate, great picture, sound is ok, easy to handle, would recomend to anyone looking for a tv

Reviews.Title: Nice LED TV. Mine is the 39 inch
Reviews.Author: MarrowX
Reviews.Content: Pretty thin bezel. Base stand is kinda cheap feeling but it looks nice. Doesn't seem to be as smooth as 120 Hz tvs but it is definitely colorful and clear. Probably won't be the best for sports, but it is still a really good looking tv.Other reviewers said that the audio is really bad, but I would say that it's fine. The audio isn't impressive, but I'm not disappointed either. I suppose I had the benefit of expecting it to suck.I like the settings layout. SImple to use. I like the preset picture modes. I think they do their job pretty well, particularly the cinema mode. This also goes for their preset audio modes.Good TV. I bought it while it was ~$311. Would still probably be worth it for 350 or so. For about 400 I think it should be possible to get the next size up or a higher refresh rate.Didn't give it 5/5 stars because I think that in order to earn that it needs to turn me into a fan boy. It's definitely really good. If it was 120 Hz at this price or a smart TV then it would probably earn the 5/5. I'm a cheapskate.

Reviews.Title: Works good as promised
Reviews.Author: kurien
Reviews.Content: Except a little design drawbacks, I think this product meets the expectation. Great Picture, Great Sound easy to control. The opening in the back looks upwards makes it vulnerable to dust accumulation inside.

Reviews.Title: Dont get one too big for the room (my fault)
Reviews.Author: Jilly
Reviews.Content: I like this tv but just wanna say...if u end up being too close to the tv because its too big for the room, etc, the picture ends up looking a little distorted but if u can get further away from it, it definitely helps.  Otherwise this tv is a great bang for the buck!!

Reviews.Title: Bang for your buck, not perfect for computer.
Reviews.Author: THANKO
Reviews.Content: After scouring amazon for the best deal I settled on the LN5300.  the biggest screen size for the cheapest price.  Does 1080 and has all the picture tuning options you could want.  For some reason my tier of comcast refuses to go full screen even in zoom and leaves a black bar at the bottom.  I am sure that is more about the signal than the tv though as there are no issues once I got my pc up and running.If you have a PC this does not have a VGA port so b prepared to upgrade to hdmi or invest in a VGA~HDMI converter box.  With 2 HDMI ports I would have preferred to leave the computer VGA to the TV and used those for other contraptions but I made it work.I like my tv to show a clear picture and have never been on the cutting edge of technology so the fancy specs don't impress me.  This one fits a budget and is big enough for most living rooms.  Buy it and enjoy!

Reviews.Title: My FOURTH LG TV
Reviews.Author: Bernard P. Finn Jr.
Reviews.Content: This is the FOURTH LG TV that I have owned and I truly love it as I have all the rest that I have owned. I originally thought that 42” would be too big for the space that I have available but I was wrong. The quality of the picture is much better than the 32” that this TV replaced... I would recommend it to anyone

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Connie Hastings
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my mom because I love my 42 inch LG LED 1080p 120Hz. She is very pleased with the picture. She can actually read the scoreboard when she watches golf. The picture is great, the sound is great. We are very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: R. K. Wallace
Reviews.Content: The LG 32LN5300 32-inch TV has a very clear and crisp picture.  The audio sound is decent and set up was easy.  This is my 2nd LG and it resides in my office.  My 12 year old Sony XBR CRT TV in my living room is starting to fail and I'm glad!  I'm looking forward to shopping for an LG to replace it - probably 42-inch since the wall cabinet was designed to fit the Sony.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV but you can get better deals if you look around
Reviews.Author: N
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV the viewing angles are great and I havent had any problems with it.  It is a little expensive and you can get some better deals if you shop around.

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture for the price.
Reviews.Author: internetbuyer1234
Reviews.Content: The TV has amazing colors and brightness. The 1080p picture is amazing, better then my old 2010 Lg TV. The 60z is OK. I see little blurring and stuttering. I would say buy this  TV if you want it.

Reviews.Title: Great 32-inch TV
Reviews.Author: John M. Tarpey
Reviews.Content: Bought this HD TV for the bedroom and its worked perfectly since we turned it on.  A good value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Just what we were expecting.
Reviews.Author: HazRes "Smitty"
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with this TV.  Not thinking that we must have the most up-to-date, this basic TV meets our needs.  The shipping was as described and we didn't mind waiting for a week or so, since the shipping was included in the price.

Reviews.Title: A crystal clear picture and easy to set up.
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: I'm just thrilled with my new 42" LG tv.  The picture and colors are crystal clear.  I have absolutely no trouble with the sound.  My son-In-law had it up and running within 30 minutes after we took it out of the box.  I wouldn't hesitate to recommend it to family and friends.  I'm amazed how easy it was ordering it from Amazon.com.  I've had my tv for about a month now.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: W. Christian
Reviews.Content: When I first ordered this TV it was lost during delivery. UPS left a note saying they dropped it off at my leasing office (a common practice for deliveries in my apartment complex) and the leasing office said they never got it. I don't know what happened to the TV, but the leasing office and UPS both told me it was not their problem. Amazon thankfully was more sympathetic and sent me a replacement TV with little hassle (astonishingly little hassle actually). You can rest assured that Amazon will protect you in the event something happens to your TV during delivery.TV itself has so far been exactly what I wanted: a high quality, no frills TV. I got the 42" for $360, which really is a great price for a name brand TV (I've been looking for months). Picture is great, body is pretty (though a little on the thick side for a modern TV). Set up was extremely easy. Haven't really used it enough yet to say more but I would definitely call this a buy.

Reviews.Title: 32 LG TV
Reviews.Author: Ruth A. Chapman
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price and the quality.  No issues, beautiful picture.  Worth every cent and it was very reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: Great bedroom tv!
Reviews.Author: Garnie Holmes
Reviews.Content: Awesome picture - good sound. I wish I had bought them when they were $230 - but at $300 still worth it for full 1080 LED with multiple hdmi ports.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ron Riley
Reviews.Content: It arrived on time,  It was exactly as advertised.  Installation was easy.  The picture quality is excellent.  The price was equal or less than all the major retailers in our area.

Reviews.Title: Tin can audio
Reviews.Author: danted
Reviews.Content: Sounds like a tin can at any volume. I tried to  make improvmemts with the settings with no such luck.The picture quality is very nice.

Reviews.Title: lg tv purchase
Reviews.Author: Chittenden Bank "lucky"
Reviews.Content: speedy delivery.. smilin ups man..tv set right up .. clear as a bell.. gotta love LG.. i have 4 now..go with the best..thanks.. amazon..n LG...saved a few $ via internet shopping.

Reviews.Title: My bad
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Just wish I would have read up on it more its not wifi compatable but I'm very pleased with the tv clear picture good sound

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: J. Morrison "envarch"
Reviews.Content: Glad we chose this LG for the bedroom. We have a larger LG in the living room (3D model) and have been very happy with it. I found a review online by a tech publication that said this model's color rendition was the best out there, and there was really no issue being a 60Hz unit. Very impressive picture, extremely happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: If I had it to do over, I'd have spent more for a better unit.
Reviews.Author: M. Robinson "Lefty"
Reviews.Content: Fine picture. Sound--not so much. Bought a Vizio sound bar for another 100 bucks, which did improve the sound, but the SRS function does not work, and whenever i adjust the volume I get a message on screen which says "this function not supported." Called LG, but they couldn't tell me how to get rid of it.

Reviews.Title: Love My New TV
Reviews.Author: Theresa
Reviews.Content: I LOVE my new tv. It would have gotten 5 stars if the picture wasn't a little dark in a dimly lit room.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Richard Grove
Reviews.Content: This was a present for my 90 year old father. He really liked the simple setup and the excellent picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: TechGeek
Reviews.Content: Good value for the money. It's not top of the line so expectations were not too high. This was used for putting in a bar for general viewing purposes and it serves the purpose well. Good color and picture quality. So far so good...seems very reliable.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded expectations
Reviews.Author: leon
Reviews.Content: Exceeded expectations.  Bought this for our bedroom and the picture is as good if not better than the 60" Sony in our family room.  Excellent picture.

Reviews.Title: Good product with inexpensive price.
Reviews.Author: Mike Kang
Reviews.Content: Very nice picture quality with inexpensive purchasing price.Shipping also fast and arrived with good condition.I recommended it to whom want to buy flat TV in a small room.

Reviews.Title: fingers crossed
Reviews.Author: careful shopper
Reviews.Content: I read all the reviews on this set so far I have none of the problems other people had we just connected the set yesterday but so far everything is fine the price was so low I hesitated but I really am glad I took the chance and ordered this tv its in my bedroom and I could not be happier lets hope my luck continues

Reviews.Title: Good for price
Reviews.Author: Chanti
Reviews.Content: I dont fine the product description is suitable. I thought the usb ports were able to recognise video but it cannot

Reviews.Title: Super deal
Reviews.Author: drband
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my son's college room. Picture is as good as any other LCD in this price range-- better than most. Great packaging.

Reviews.Title: Requires tinkering in settings
Reviews.Author: Donkey Face
Reviews.Content: This is my first LCD tv. At first I was disappointed because the picture was dull and off color. After tinkering for some time I finally got it (close) to look like my laptop screen. Once you get it right, it is very nice to look at.

Reviews.Title: great tv.. value for money
Reviews.Author: ajesh
Reviews.Content: i considered more than 20 brands to purchase a television. finally i bought this one. great tv. value for the money

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Very good picture quality! Love this tv. Volume could be a little louder, but it's a great tv overall. I strongly recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase for a fantastic price
Reviews.Author: Adventurer
Reviews.Content: The image on the LG TV is exceptional.  I still can't believe it's being sod for such a reasonable price.  I couldn't find the same quality of TV online or anywhere else.

Reviews.Title: JUNK!
Reviews.Author: J. Bono "Amazon Addict"
Reviews.Content: This television set is a piece of junk. Do NOT buy any LG television sets from anywhere. I only had the set connected to my U-Verse system for three weeks and it stopped working. It keeps shutting off and back on until I want to throw it out the window. That started nine days ago. Since it is still under warranty, I contacted LG directly and have been getting the runaround ever since. LG had me contact their local repairman, who ordered parts and promised I would have my set by Monday (two days ago). I have called the repair place every day since the beginning of the problem, and I keep getting different stories about a timeline. Now I am told that the parts are on backorder and they don't know when they can fix my set. So I called LG again and asked them to replace the set. They refused. I paid for a new TV set and all I got was junk that has to be repaired virtually right out of the box. I don't want the thing repaired. I want a new set. I will NEVER again purchase any LG product. Their customer service is a joke. I would not even give this product one star, but the review system won't let me get by with anything less.

Reviews.Title: $398 @ WalMart 09/18/2013
Reviews.Author: C.I.
Reviews.Content: For the price I shouldn't complain. It does what it's supposed to with one exception: the USB playback does not support video playback. It is serious when it comes to supported files, however, despite what is listed otherwise in the various manual and specifications, I cannot get the T.V. to play video files. I have tried numerous converters and even contacting LG CS.I have tried .DiVX and .MP4 files and neither work. Which is quite disappointing as this was one of the deciding factors for me. Unfortunately there isn't a comparable at this size and price range, so returning it would be daft. It is not on display at WalMart and it's not feasible purchasing online, unless shipping is free. There is IMHO no difference between the LN5200 and LN5300 with the exception of HDMI ports, consider that model as well.I would fully recommend this T.V. if and only if, they did not advertise the USB video playback. I feel cheated, despite paying such a low price as I was really looking forward to that feature. It looks pretty and is compliment worthy. Sound is decent and speakers face down, buttons are on the back, stand is okay. I would mount this T.V. and I think that was the intention as to where the speakers are located. OSD is helpful, their factory setting wasn't too far off from where I preferred my adjustments.If it was more expensive, I wouldn't have been able to recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Unimpressive - we returned it within 24 hours
Reviews.Author: Lindsay
Reviews.Content: We might have gotten a lemon. The picture looked very unimpressive, and we returned it within 24 hours. The color was just dull, and everything was pixelated even when we put hd movies on it.

Reviews.Title: What has happend to LG????
Reviews.Author: CampR "CampR"
Reviews.Content: I own an LG TV and I love it.  I purchased a larger one for bedroom and it arrived with a busted screen, so I ordered a replacement and received it on Friday.  Took it out and set it up.  NO picture - only static with a BLACK screen.  It was hooked to Direct TV so we knew there was a problem when there was no picture and only static.  It wouldn't respond to remote buttons or the buttons on the TV itself - definitely a problem.  I called LG customer service and we performed a couple of their tests recommendations and finally got voice sound but still no picture, then we lost the voice again.  AND it even responded even less to any button commands.  The Customer Service lady told me it was defective.  VERY disappointing to say the least - to receive not one but 2 broke/defective TV's.  I'm ready to get my money back and try another brand. And I really do like my smaller LG so  this is even more upsettting!

Reviews.Title: Meets Expectations But Remote Control UI Design is Horrible
Reviews.Author: Craig Schreiner
Reviews.Content: I would rate the product 4 stars, but when I posted this review on LG's own website it was rejected because it did not meet their guidelines.  After I read their guidelines I was unable to determine what was wrong and since LG didn't spell out what I did wrong, I can only assume they don't want to hear something not slanted extremely favorable to them so now the product gets a 3 star rating based on the LG manufacturer and puts me into question whether or not I will continue to do business with them.That said, here is my original review post:With the consumer culture in a capitalistic society so desirous of purchasing new technology even when it's not absolutely needed, being so compelling, I was more than hesitant in spending my hard earned way in life for frivolous TV upgrades until I had to.  I finally made my first HDTV buy in September 2013, when one of my SDTV's finally died.  The room for the TV was not my main viewing room and I spend my money based on needs before wants so I didn't get what I would really want, but rather what I needed.With this first HDTV purchase, I chose the LG name by reputation and past experiences with this manufacturer.  I have now had this TV for ~4.5 months and I am satisfied for the price I paid.  The quality, durability has met expectations and the HD resolution is what one would expect for the specifications.The Pro's far exceed the Con's and while I would rather not emphasize the negatives, they are the details that follow.  Regardless of these negatives, I would still recommend and purchase another LG product (except for maybe my #1 complaint below).1. The technology to un-mute the sound when adjusting the volume DOWN is one of the most annoying and pet peeves I have.  With capitalistic commercialism tactics increasing the volume during commercials, I always chose to mute the volume.  Since the volume can be so annoyingly raised for commercials, over what was previously being heard, I often want to lower the volume and un-mute it at the now lowered volume.  This LG product does not support this.  It un-mutes the volume as soon as either volume down (or up) is changed.  This problem is exacerbated in its severity because of the #2 problem that I've stated below.2. The volume level quality is reasonable, but power to volume ratio is very poor.  What I mean is that on certain programming or streaming where input volume levels coming in are already low, this LG product does not have enough power to compensate.  Thus when adjusting the volume from 0 to 25% there is enough noticeable change to accommodate the level desired, but when increasing the volume between 25% and 100% there is very little change to accommodate the level desired.  So when a low input volume single is delivered, I often have to increase the TV volume to 75%-100% to get close to my desired output and find it to be still not adequate.3. The remote control layout is absolutely horrible, messy, over cluttered, and just bad.  The placements of the key/most used buttons are out of phase with common sense.  The mute button is mixed in with several other buttons that I don't want to be near when I'm seeking to mute the sound for example.  The "enter" button is down at the bottom of the keypad numbers.  There are several buttons that bring up the main menu, but just focused on the title of what's on the button.  Wasted buttons and space since it's all the same menu and if one really wants the menu, then using up/down arrows to get to the focus of one's desire is all that is needed, IMHO.  Catastrophic FAIL for the UI engineer who designed this.4. The favorite's button provides a list of the set favorites, but there is no mechanism to hit one button to move to the next or previous favorite in the list.  Since the favorite button brings up a list, you then have to move to the bottom of the controller to use the up/down arrow keys to scroll the list and then hit the button to "enter" the selection.  Way too many buttons to press and find when in the dark lying in bed at night.5. Not enough input ports, but sadly, that's relative to the price paid.

Reviews.Title: A great TV for the den
Reviews.Author: J. Hunt
Reviews.Content: Okay, first I have to caution you that I am going from a 10 year old, low def, crt television to a high def, flat screen. So I may be a bit overexuberant in my love for this set. Putting it together was a breeze, hooking it up was easy. I bought a Roku 3 at the same time. We do not have cable and live too far out in the sticks for any over the air channels. However, connecting and using the Roku was a breeze, we love the picture and sound. I also have a wii hooked up to the tv and game play is nice. The second hdmi port allows me to hook up my computer and watch sport streams, and I expect we will upgrade with googlecast eventually.Overall, the picture is nice, the sound is good (not exactly world class stereo, but acceptable and easy to upgrade) and the controls are easy to use. If you want a home theater, this not your set, but if you like to watch a little video and not make the tv the center of your life this is a very good choice.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture...if it stays on.
Reviews.Author: Josiah Huestis
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV and loved it at first. it worked great and the picture was awesome with Blu-ray and DVD. After about 2 months it started turning itself off mid movie and after about 10 seconds or so turning itself back on. This had gotten worse and worse till now it will only stay on for about 4 minutes before it shuts off for at least 10 minutes or more. The only way to turn it off after it has shut itself off is to unplug it but id does not solve the issue. All these issues are not the fault of Amazon, but of the brand itself. I only wish the problem had occurred before my window to return it had closed. DO NOT BUY THIS TV!

Reviews.Title: Not as good as expected, but OK for the price
Reviews.Author: Tim Hagelin
Reviews.Content: I admit it, I was hoping for a bargain, but you get what you pay for. The resolution is OK. The ease of use is fine. Setup was easy. I feel like it's somewhere between CRT and HD quality on what I've watched thus far (FB & BB games). I've adjusted the picture settings a bit, and it's all about the same...slightly grainy, but good enough. This is my first LG product. I have to admit that I was spoiled by my Samsung and my Toshiba (FWIW, I do like the Samsung better than the Toshiba).

Reviews.Title: Connection problems
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Pauls
Reviews.Content: I like the TV but having a problem with the connections. The sound keeps going off & I have to wiggle the wire to get the sound to come back on.

Reviews.Title: lg tv
Reviews.Author: Shirley Harrison
Reviews.Content: my son loves the television.  Although they had a 46 inch the same price I should have waited a little longer and got a bigger TV.

Reviews.Title: Oh my!
Reviews.Author: Wayne M.
Reviews.Content: I cannot believe that an LG TV would have such a terrible picture; I also have a 32 inch with a beautiful picture. This one had a very dull picture; and no one in my family could figure out where to change the: tint/contrast/color. I think it is just auto; and you have to deal with the picture. I could be wrong. Just an awful picture on this TV; and I had to send it back...

Reviews.Title: nice TV
Reviews.Author: tomana
Reviews.Content: does what it's supposed to do but if you think you might one day be watching any 3D dvd's you might want to consider a different model

Reviews.Title: Good little set
Reviews.Author: lin8
Reviews.Content: I purchased this set as a gift for my mother-in-law, and it fits her needs perfectly. I still need to go in and manually calibrate the television, since the settings, out of the box, aren't great. But, for the price, that is a small thing for a quality set.

Reviews.Title: good tv - decent service.
Reviews.Author: Vinod Karthikeyan
Reviews.Content: Had minor issues with HDMI slot but was replaced for free.. worth the buy for money spent...having no issues for last 10months of buying it

Reviews.Title: Excellent Image Quality, Features, Connectivity
Reviews.Author: Abs
Reviews.Content: So far very happy with this purchase, very good interface that can be used with any wireless mouse/keyboard or with the regular remote.Built in browser works very well.No complaints, only minor drawback (audio out) is only via optical (had to purchase a converter to use with my sound bar.

Reviews.Title: LG TV is great product
Reviews.Author: familyman04
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with product. Purchased a 55" LG 3D TV for den last year and were so pleased that we went with a 42" for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: LG HAS MADE HAVEN COMPLETE!
Reviews.Author: dee
Reviews.Content: :-D. ....very easy set up, Beautiful colorful Pictures! My Housemate can not wait to get one for their Room.Waiting to have mounted on my Wall!

Reviews.Title: Just like promised
Reviews.Author: jesse
Reviews.Content: Works great and has great picture. Only has on humid plug in but that's not really a big issue. Viewing angle is very wide for a larger group of people.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: edod
Reviews.Content: Good picture, good sound. Only reason for four stars is that the black portion of the screenhas a white square in it about a foot long.

Reviews.Title: TV arrived with damaged screen panel
Reviews.Author: Manuel Tovar
Reviews.Content: I live in Venezuela and the TV arrived with damages. With a large black patch on the screen. So bad.

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: R. Gross
Reviews.Content: Good tv, good picture and sound. Only real complaint is it feels really cheaply made and low quality. But for what I'm using it for it works great.

Reviews.Title: first flat screen
