Reviews.Author: Tracy Gouran
Reviews.Content: glad my boyfriend talked me into this size was going to get 19 inch. picture is good many controls over picture quality.great price great delivery

Reviews.Title: A Smart Solution
Reviews.Author: Caroline Z Mengon
Reviews.Content: I purchased this LG 32-inch LED television as a replacement for my elderly father's monster TV that finally died. The picture is great, setup was easy, and he is pleased with it overall. Since I have two other LG LED televisions, I feel I can vouch for their performance record. The sound performance is adequate though not impressive, but overall these are great televisions for the price.

Reviews.Title: Works great although the remote is badly designed
Reviews.Author: Marti R
Reviews.Content: I really like this TV, for the most part...but I find the remote is very badly designed.  It has all the buttons I want, but they're all the same size and shape, and too close together so it's virtually impossible to find the right button in the dark. (I actually waited to write this review for a while to see if it got any easier as I got used to it, but I've had it for a couple of weeks now and it's not improved at all).Also, the selection menu is extremely large and bright, which is annoying for two reasons.  When I am watching TV in bed in the dark, I have the brightness and contrast turned down so the TV isn't so bright.  However the menu is so big and bright that it's very jarring to use it in the dark such as to set the sleep timer.  Secondly, when I am selecting a different picture setting the menu obscures the picture to where I can't really tell what my selection will look like until after I close the menu.  I'm sure I'll memorize the names after a while but in the meantime it's annoying.Otherwise I like the TV, the picture is crisp and I've not had any problems with it.  I like the auto-dimming feature--a great selling point.  The TV is also the exact measurements promised so it fits in my TV cabinet with no issues.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Richard W. Chase
Reviews.Content: The LG 32LN5300 produces razor-sharp images of the highest quality. Considering its modest price, this set truly is a bargain.

Reviews.Title: VERY HAPPY AND EXCITED TO GET THIS TV. IT WAS JUST LIKE THE SPECS SAID
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: AGAIN I BOUGHT THIS FOR MY SON. THE THIRD CHILD MOVED OUT AND BOUGHT HER OWN HOME, SO HE MOVED INTO A BIG ROOM. I HAVE BEEN LOOKING AT ALOT OF TV'S BEFORE I FINALLY PURCHASED THIS ONE. IT HAS AWESOME COLOR, SOUND, AND THE AUTO DISPLAY IS SO COOL. I AM SO PLEASED WITH THIS TV ITS UNREAL, I THINK WE ARE GONNA GET ANOTHER ONE NEXT MONTH. ALSO SHIPPING WAS SO FAST IT GOT HERE FIVE DAYS BEFORE THE EXPECTED DELIVERY TIME.....WAY TO GO AMAZON  THANK YOU,  JAMIE MILLER

Reviews.Title: The TV turn on and turn off frequently by itself
Reviews.Author: Paul Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed about this TV. It turn on and turn off frequently by itself. I have tried to set it up by many way but it does not work. It still has the same damage.I am living in Venezuela, I would like to know how to return this product or how to fix it, at least...Please, reply as soon as possible to my email.Paul Gonzalezemail: gonzalezpvw@hotmail.com

Reviews.Title: TV turns off and on at will
Reviews.Author: Kim Bey
Reviews.Content: Make sure to invest in all warranties. It has a good picture and sound quality when it works. After about three or four weeks of use it started shutting off and on. I called Amazon and they said a small number of all flat screen TV's not specific to brand name will do this and he went on to say bad boards ect.... They replaced it but why go through the red tape for a idiot box.

Reviews.Title: LG television order from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Danny Lopez
Reviews.Content: Had a few problems after ordering this TV with order being dropped or lost (not sure what exactly) however when I spoke with Amazon associate and then supervisor problem was solved immediately, along with a discount and a credit toward my next Amazon purchase. That is the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars. Very pleased with the TV and everything about it!

Reviews.Title: Nice tv
Reviews.Author: matt
Reviews.Content: Ok let me start out first by saying if this tv blows up next week ( i just got it today) i will redue this review. The tv is clear, saves power, works fine. In descirption fails to mention that it comes with an ac input ( the 3 prong red yelo white) 2 hdmi, and a vhf input. I didnt realize it had a vhf untill i saw it unpacked. This is a huge suprise to me as i thought i would need an adapter. Sooo to sum up, inhavmt had it for long but i havnt found anything wrong with it either, so i give it 5 stars. Again ill rewrite if i come across issues.so its been about 3 months and still no issue. great power saveing options and easy interface when adjusting settings

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good... So Far
Reviews.Author: Tara O.
Reviews.Content: This is the first television I've owned in nearly two decades, so of course I think it's great. The only thing that I wish it had and which it doesn't is Picture-in-Picture. Only, when I was buying, I didn't know enough about the features available in televisions today to look for PiP.

Reviews.Title: Shipped on time with a great price
Reviews.Author: Dr Tim
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife because her 28" no-name brand from China burned out in less than a year. I decided to go with LG, a well known name brand for electronics and this order has yet to disappoint. The colors are crisp, although the speakers themselves are kind of useless. My wife has a 5.1 surround sound system anyway, so she keeps the screen speakers disabled. This is not the sellers problem, but the manufacturers. Shipped as expected. Really like the Saturday deliveries.

Reviews.Title: Spot on screen made vote less than perfect
Reviews.Author: AJ Dennis Landry
Reviews.Content: When powered it on there was what appeared as a water image on black screen, but once picture comes in it vanish.  Unfortunately the water image has not gone away. The picture quality itself is marvelous.

Reviews.Title: Perfectproduct
Reviews.Author: Di Xu
Reviews.Content: looks excellent, the size is OK, the price is good. i wish i can have the 39 inches one. i will continue buy LG TVs

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Ketchup Pharaoh
Reviews.Content: Very nice for its size and price range. This is my second LG TV and I am very happy with both. Only complaint would be sound quality isn't super great, but I plan on upgrading with a sound bar anyway.

Reviews.Title: 42LN5300
Reviews.Author: W. Martin
Reviews.Content: The product is missing a fundamental feature.  It does not allow channel labeling, which is common place on most TV's today, even entry level models.  Another drawback is the channel up/down functionality.  It cycles through one tuner, and then switches to another tuner.  For example, if you have analog channels 3 , 4, and other analog channels, along with a digital channel 3.1, it will cycle from channel 3 to 4 and all the other channels, before it will then switch to the digital channel.  Very confusing, especially if you have other model TV's that operate in the industry de-facto standard way.The picture quality is fine and the remote is easy to use, with the exception of the confusing channel up/down functionality.  I think the Samsung TV's are a better value.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: at first i could not get surround sound but was able to figure it out and am very a happy customer

Reviews.Title: Great value at great price.
Reviews.Author: Dot Saunders
Reviews.Content: My husband loves his new toy.  He has it in the bedroom and it puts him to sleep every night.

Reviews.Title: Okay for a 39"
Reviews.Author: Rich in Classic Flavor
Reviews.Content: Day 1:The good:Picture is pretty clearSound is decent in a large room (I've had other flat screens and they all began distorting at higher levels of volume)No discoloration at the sides/cornersLettering in commercials is clearThe stupid red light in the center isn't noticeable (Center of TV is about eye level with people on couch though)The bad:TV controls - annoyingly positioned ~3 inches from the edge on the back right side...  additionally the input and select buttons are not next to each other so I have to memorize the patter.The picture looks terrible out of the box and must be adjustedThe I/Os are dual purposedIts small for the $$$...  yeah it was 100 cheaper than the 50" I was considering and the picture is probably better but it was still 300 for a smallish tv (my old 42" seemed significantly larger)

Reviews.Title: One of the best gifts ever
Reviews.Author: Angela
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for myself from the money that was given to me on my birthday and it's been one of the best things I've gotten. It's the perfect size for me and the picture is beautiful. I can't wait to try gaming on it and see how the picture is! I've loved all the products I've gotten from LG and this is no exception. I've not had it long, but I've had no issues with it and once again, the quality of the screen is awesome! The only issue I have is that it doesn't have a VGA slot so I can connect my laptop to it (but my laptop is an older model so that's more my problem than an issue with the TV).Definitely worth the price!

Reviews.Title: 42 inch LG HD TV
Reviews.Author: Gb Enterprises "GBELECT"
Reviews.Content: So far so good easy to mount very lite and great color and stunning HD,just wish they would have let me know it was coming they told me one date but it came early,glad I just happen to be home. The free shipping is also a plus it was packed very well.

Reviews.Title: LG 32 inch tv
Reviews.Author: Grandma Bee "Grandma Bee"
Reviews.Content: I am definitely not a techie - I was looking for a new TV which is "Smart" so that I could connect to my wireless.  This TV in an of itself is ok, as far as picture, etc . The price was definitely great for a Smart TV.  I purchased this because the Amazon site advertised this as a "Smart TV" in the section where they do comparisons with other televisions.  Turns out this is NOT a smart TV - after all.  This was confirmed when, after multiple attempts to set it up to my wireless, I called Amazon Tech support.  The description given under comparisons is an error on Amazon's part.  Because it would cost so much to send it back, I am keeping it, but I am extremely disappointed.  What else can I say - Amazon tech support is changing their site - but this doesn't help me much.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Heather McRae
Reviews.Content: I am so happy to have received my TV.  It's great to have my own TV in my own room!

Reviews.Title: got lines on video image
Reviews.Author: E Robert Klein
Reviews.Content: After purchasing unit at end of October, sixty days later the video image developed lines across.  Called my Cable TV provider and they checked their cabling charged me money and told me flat out: the problem is with the TV.  In over 30 years on buying TVs. never saw a problem like this.

Reviews.Title: Worked... For 10 minutes
Reviews.Author: Joseph Keimig
Reviews.Content: I have had good luck in the past with LG products and expected the same out of this LED TV.  10 minutes after powering it on the screen completely stopped working.  I assumed it just needed adjusting in the picture settings, unfortunately it was completely dead (audio still worked).After 15 minutes with Amazon tech support the tech came to the same conclusion I had and agreed to a full refund.  I will say Amazon made this very easy, but couldn't get the new TV to me until after the Super Bowl.I went down the street and bought a 42 Samsung LED and am very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Hoar
Reviews.Content: Set up was easy. The problem was first screen was pink, then green, then a terrific picture. I called LG & their resolution was to have a Technician come out. OK I was upset since I had the set just under an hour. The Technician called & he was going to come over but he believed it was a mother board problem. I called LG & they said they could not do anything until the Technician looked at it, unacceptable to me. Amazon took care of it immediately, WONDERFUL. I had another the next day! Well, same problem, I called Amazon & they were wonderful. They said I should return it & they will close out stock until they investigated. Amazon service absolutely terrific --- TV not so much.

Reviews.Title: works good do far,
Reviews.Author: jerome w pankey
Reviews.Content: I will be home from surgery next week, Hope it works well then. when I really need it. Thanks so much

Reviews.Title: not wowed at all
Reviews.Author: Dan Mueller
Reviews.Content: Nice tv, but if  it is not hooked up to hd tv. (sat. tv without hdmi) the pic is VERY grainy. When I hook up hdmi I will write a follow up. As of now 3 stars but that could change.

Reviews.Title: Do your research first!
Reviews.Author: Jill W.
Reviews.Content: I bought my 42" LG TV 3 months ago.  The TV now goes off and on on it's own.  I have no way of controlling this.When i searched on-line, I fount too many others who have experienced the same problem.  This was a waste of $!

Reviews.Title: Picture was okay
Reviews.Author: Gayle
Reviews.Content: Picture was okay; didn't have the feature that was advertised on the LG website.  I wanted to return it to Amazon but it had to go through their Audio & Video Center (I think that's where many of the electronic products originate) but Amazon said the Center doesn't accept returns on televisions that are over 20 inches.  I'm very disappointed and won't be making purchases through Amazon's Audio & Video Center in the future.

Reviews.Title: Not enough inputs and outputs on TV.
Reviews.Author: Larry Brady
Reviews.Content: The TV is great. But there is not enough RCA outlets on the TV to hook more then one component up to it. I have my satellite hooked into it but the only way to watch a DVD movie is unhook the satellite and hook up the DVD player. It's a pain in the ass.

Reviews.Title: Poorly made, terrible bleed, stay away
Reviews.Author: marcko
Reviews.Content: The LG LN5300 has a tremendous amount of LED backlight bleed throughout the screen. I returned the set 3 times and all of the sets had huge bleeds right in the middle of the screen. It's a cheap price for a 39" TV but you are probably better off getting something of better quality. It was my 4th LG but the worst of the group. Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk...
Reviews.Author: M.Kelley
Reviews.Content: This TV never worked.  Embarrassing as an Xmas gift.  I paid a little more for an LG, due to another crappy flat screen TV experience, that one dying after about a month.I don't know if it's how they pack them, ship them, or that X% are just junk and never work correctly.  Sent it back and still awaiting refund (after being told a replacement would take about 6 weeks.)Very disappointed in Amazon.  I'll pick up the replacement at a regular store, as I suspect they're not robust enough to be shipped to a home.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: rickyfull
Reviews.Content: The quality and picture of this LG LN5300 is very poor, don't buy it, its a waste money, I highly do not recommended it

Reviews.Title: Buy It
Reviews.Author: John Faley
Reviews.Content: Got it for $349 at a brick & mortar but have seen it even lower. Easy set up. Went to AVS Forums for calibration settings. Spent a bit of time going through all the different menus and adjustments, and there are many. but wow. couldn't ask for more in a picture. really nice. speakers fire out the back so if you put your head behind the tv it actually sounds a lot better than what you hear out front, but volume is fine and for a bedroom this set is perfect. once again, outstanding picture quality. people who complain about picture must be doing something wrong. get HDMI cable, connect, go to input selections and choose HDMI, make setting and picture adjustments as per AVS and you should be totally pleased.

Reviews.Title: On Time, as ordered!
Reviews.Author: B. W. "Bill"  Sharp
Reviews.Content: Delivery was on time, merchandise was as ordered and the deliveryman unpacked and tested the unit.The only thing that did not meet my expectations was the deliveryman did not understand how to set up the TV which has turned into a slight problem!

Reviews.Title: I discovered that I need HD.
Reviews.Author: Ron Fass
Reviews.Content: We have charter cable but no HD. By manipulating the channels there is an awkward method to get programming. Despite this I am very happy with the results. With HD I will probably love the set.Quality of program content is more important to me than a super sharp picture.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the money.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought product for donation.  I was happy with the specs but can't report on the picture quality or serviceability of this unit. Looked like a good deal for the price.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Picture
Reviews.Author: max "max"
Reviews.Content: The only negative aspect is:  LG Should include easy directions oh how to hook-up the t.v. to your dvd player and cable box along with understandable scamatics

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Andres P.
Reviews.Content: Nice television at a very reasonable price. Next time I would buy a bigger one because it looks like it has less than 32  inch.

Reviews.Title: I FEEL CHEATED
Reviews.Author: EDIXON HERNANDEZ
Reviews.Content: LG tv manager never wanted to turn on or off so I feel cheated by the seller and therefore by amazon.the tv when I was saying that handle the product was in good condition (used) but it was all a lie.

Reviews.Title: tuka from Delray Beach FL 61yrs old
Reviews.Author: Edmeia D'Brito
Reviews.Content: My TV room is small and this TV is nor HD so it makes my eyes tired...but i am keeping it!

Reviews.Title: I have one big problem
Reviews.Author: David O. Currier
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture quality! One problem, though: I can use the remote you sent ONLY to turn the set on and off. To access channels, and all other tasks, I have to use the original remote that came with my cable box, which is quickly wearing out after 10 years of use. Why doesn't the new remote open channels? Instead I get a message box that says, in effect, "That function is not available." I'm sure this is not what LG intended--the remote should handle everything, Can you help?

Reviews.Title: Horrible picture quality
Reviews.Author: Jay Sanaknaki "World Kite"
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my rental unit and it is a total disappointment. The picture quality is not consistent with a 1080HDTV. Please do not waste you money.

Reviews.Title: Awesome LG but $$$$
Reviews.Author: jordan
Reviews.Content: I bought this exact same TV in 2011 on "black Friday" for $350! 3 years later it's more expensive and listed in the "20%" off section? This old school 60mhz refresh rate should be $300 at most! Guess i'll wait till black Friday to find another deal for the bedroom TV

Reviews.Title: LG 32LN5300 32-Inch LED-lit 1080p 60Hz TV
Reviews.Author: T. Grider
Reviews.Content: Just a personal thing, but this TV feels cheap to me and the picture quality is only okay. There is not much for me to recommend about this TV other than the price.

Reviews.Title: the tv was shut down and will not start?
Reviews.Author: Vicen Jimmy Escalona Patiño
Reviews.Content: Lords amazon, buy LG 32LN5300 32-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED lit TV! Liberti express give me 16/08/2013 day yesterday watching a movie the TV will turn off! will not start! red light blinks and no way to turn it! How do I do now? where I take?

Reviews.Title: Standard product
Reviews.Author: Thai
Reviews.Content: Nothing special. Very simple tv. Less connection. Price is higher than different brand. The design wasn't look nice. Need more improved

Reviews.Title: TELEVISION THIS HARD AND GIVE TWO FOUR MONTHS MONTHS WARRANTY
Reviews.Author: Albin Glen Mendoza
Reviews.Content: Good afternoon, I buy the 30th October 2013, a television brand 32LN5300 LG 32-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED-lit TV, Sold by: Amazon.com LLC, and since last week to encerdelo automatically shuts off and no lights any way. I wanted to know if this TV has some international guarantee because I live in Venezuela.

Reviews.Title: Broken in 3 months
Reviews.Author: Notyourfather "HereorThere"
Reviews.Content: This thing is broken already. Supposedly this thing has a lot of issues, and now I believe. Just turns off and on randomly. It's not the clock setting.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: Neva G. Allen
Reviews.Content: i like this tv but could not use my husbands head phones had to get a digital analog converter and a bluerigger digital optical audio in order to plug in the head phones my husband is deft the only way he can here tv is with head phones when we got these working it was fine

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware - LG Quality Very Bad - Failed In 11 Days
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I am just letting anyone out there know, for this particular model, it failed me after 11 days and had to be returned. Subsequent research on TV reliability discovered that LG "quality" is near the bottom of the barrel.Also this set has several missing features that aren't good for a TV set.- No headphone jack.- The only audio output jack is digital fiber optic and no regular audio output.- No onscreen program guide - NONE!! (All you get is the name of the current program on a channel you are watching but not upcoming shows, no descriptions and no choices outside of just the one single channel you have tuned in at the time and just the name of the show, nothing more. It's minimal and shows lack of care for customer convenience.)Worst of all - mine lasted 11 days - then I went to turn it on, boom, nothing, light on front went dead, would not turn on even using the side power button. Other TV and electronics plugged into the same power surge protector worked perfectly fine, so it wasn't with the power, nor did it work on other outlets - it was with the TV - 11 days, then burned out and had to return it for a full refund.I would NOT recommend this set to anyone nor would I recommend LG, at all, period.Go online and research LG (Lucky Goldstar which was a joke low end brand during the 1980's) and see just how low on the totem pole they are among those who know TVs.

Reviews.Title: Its damage
Reviews.Author: Daniel Raven
Reviews.Content: The tv Turn Off and on itself, what a crazy, I prefer buy some samsung tv, I dont Know whats happening

Reviews.Title: This TV is not a Smart TV.
Reviews.Author: Philip Christiansen
Reviews.Content: This item, while a decent television, is listed under Similar Items as being a Smart TV. This is not the case. Misinformation at its best!

Reviews.Title: One unit LG TV received broken.
Reviews.Author: Arturo E.
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed with my purchase of these 2nunits of LG TV's from amazon. One of these TV 's upon openingThe box.  The front glass screen was broken. I wrote and complained to Amazon asking for a replacement but they have not complied. Bad customer serviceI need a replacementARturo Martinez.

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: John H. Cook Sr. "poojay"
Reviews.Content: The price was right. I was looking for a TV to replace one in the bedroom.We already had a larger LG in the den. My son is a Cisco system engineer and he advised me also to get the LGJohn in SC

Reviews.Title: LG Televisions
Reviews.Author: Sylvia
Reviews.Content: I purchased a 39LN5300 recently and returned it in two days.  The picture was terrible.  Flesh tones were both red and green at the same time.  The Picture Wizard is basically useless.  I've had more TV's than most people, I would imagine.  This unit was way too bright....I could feel my eyes searing in their sockets.  The TV has too many picture options (and I like adjustments!).  This is the second LG TV I bought; the first being in 2010 - that one had several dead pixels after one day.  I will never buy this brand again...A word to the wise:  pay a cheap price and you get a cheap product.

Reviews.Title: Not so nice.
Reviews.Author: Silvio
Reviews.Content: It is not so flat, And it doesnt have internet. I bought this because i thought it had internet. However, when it arrived and i plugged and everything i noticed that it doesnt have. Had to return it for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Worst customer support
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: Be wary about the customer support of this company. I have the product and I needed to order a base mount because I had lost mine after hanging it on the wall for a year. I need the pedestal that connects the tv to the base. I have contacted Element's customer support over and over through email and never get a response. I call the customer service number over and over and only sit on hold forever until it finally goes to voice mail, where I leave a message only to never be called back. Go ahead and see for yourself 1-888-338-5666. Horrible company, that you will regret doing business with.

Reviews.Title: *** Warning *** From Expereince LG's banded TV's not a good brand!
Reviews.Author: Puddy_Tat "Tat"
Reviews.Content: Hello all,From past Experience with the LG TV product line their quality is poor at best and the durability is none existent. When you have an issue you get lead around in circles by their support teams blaming everything else but their hardware! And when proven to be their issue they do not honor their warranty!!!I simply would not trust buying LG TV's due to their overall quality.Over Seas support who you can't understand that doesn't know how to support their hardware.Inability to take responsibility for their poor workmanship.If you buy a LG TV be prepared for a fight and if you are outside the 30-day return policy if you have ANY ISSUE!!!

Reviews.Title: LG misrepresents product
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: I replaced a perfectly good tv because I wanted one with headphone jack to use in my workout room.  I live chatted with a person at LG and asked specifically if this unit had a headphone jack and was told that it did, and that the 5300 series is the only series with a headphone jack.  Guess what?  No headphone jack.  I have not even taken the protective film off the tv yet nor hooked it up, so I don't know how well it works, but I am disgusted that I didn't get what I expected.
